SA01abhsubhu:5: tathāhyanena kauśalyena dvividho 'nuśaṃso labhyate - manaskārānuśaṃsaṃḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayānuśaṃsaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:7: śamathānukūlyaṃ punareṣu sthāneṣu kṛtakauśalasya niḥsaṃdehatayā yatheṣṭamālaṃbane aikāgrayayogena sukhaṃ cittasamādhānataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:8: vipaśyanāvṛddhayānu kūlyaṃ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ jñeyaparīkṣayā prajñāprakarṣagamanataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:12: saparigrahadehagrahaṇena bāhyasyādhyātmikasya ca rūpaskandhasya grahaṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:39: evaṃ caivaṃ ceti varṇasaṃsthānabhedaiḥ citrīkārateti tathāsaṃjñā /
SA01abhsubhu:43: tathāhi śubhānāmaśubhānāṃ vā vipāka ālayavijñānaṃ nityamupekṣayaiva saṃprayuktaṃ bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:54: yacca tasya cakṣuṣo bījamupacitamālayavijñānaṃ yata āyatyāṃ cakṣunirvartiṣyate,
SA01abhsubhu:60: taddhātuvaddraṣṭavyaṃ tacca yathāyogamiti yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyati yacca tadbījamityevamādi yojayitavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:71: lakṣaṇataḥ saṃniveśato 'nugrahopaghātataḥ kriyāsaṃniśrayataḥ kriyālakṣaṇataḥ maṇḍanataśca caturṇā daśānāmaṣṭānāmekaikasya ca yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:90: spraṣṭavyaikadeśavyavasthānamāmarśanata ātulanataḥ sparśanata āpīḍanataḥ saṃsargato dhātuvaiṣamyasāmyataśca /
SA01abhsubhu:108: avyavahārakuśalasyāśikṣitabhāṣatayā rūpe saṃjñā bhavati na tu rūpamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:116_0: vedanāsaṃjñāvarjyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ caitasikānāṃ cittaviprayuktānāṃ ca saṃskāraskandhalakṣaṇatve
SA01abhsubhu:120: cetanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ lakṣaṇataḥ karmataśca nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:123: tathāhi [Abhidh-s-bh_5] yathābhisaṃskāraṃ kuśalādiṣu dharmeṣu cittasya pravṛttirbhavatīti /
SA01abhsubhu:124: ālaṃbane cittadhāraṇaṃ tatraiva punaḥ punarāvarjanaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:127: vijñānotpattāvindriyasya sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlo yo vikārastadākāraḥ sparśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:130: ata eva tatpradhāno 'nyaiḥ saṃhartu na śakyate saṃstutaṃ vastu pūrvānubhūtaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:140: upapattiprātilambhikaṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ ca yathākramaṃ vipākāgamādhigamarūpaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:142: sthāmavānvīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramo 'nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvityevamādisūtrapadāni yathākramaṃ saṃnāhādiṣvabhyutsāhavastuṣu yojayitavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:147: sāsravā dharmā āsravā āsravasthānīyāśca viṣayā iha veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:166: nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti kṛtaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityayaṃ hetvapavādaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:167: nāsti duścaritasucaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti phalāpavādaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:168: nāstyayaṃ loko nāsti paraloko nāsti mātā nāsti pitā nāsti sattva upapāduka iti kriyāpavādaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:181: tadvilakṣaṇatvāt na hi te ātmalakṣaṇā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:189: na hi vinā dehenā tmaparikalpa upalabhyata iti /
SA01abhsubhu:194: rūpāmātmeti samanupaśyati vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānamātmeti samanupaśyatītyetāḥ pañcātmadṛṣṭayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:199: yasya hi yadvaśena vartate dāne viniyoge vā tasya tadātmīyamityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:203: tadyathā rajjuṃ sarpato gṛhṇāti kaścit sahasā,
SA01abhsubhu:204: na punā rajjuriti nirūpayaṃstāṃ sarpato gṛhṇīyāditi //
SA01abhsubhu:223: bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ śrutādikuśale prayuktasya tadālaṃbanādbahiḥ kāmaguṇeṣu cittagamanaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:225: nimittavikṣepaḥ pare māṃ guṇavattayā saṃbhāvayiṣyantītyetannimittametadartha kuśalaprayuktasya śanaiḥ tatparihāṇito veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:226: dauṣṭhulya vikṣepo 'haṃkārādidauṣṭhulyavaśādutpannotpanneṣu sukhādiṣu vediteṣvahaṃ mama asmīti vā karaṇāt kuśalapakṣāpariśuddhito veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:229: nimittīkāraḥ tasyaiva veditasya punaḥ punaścitrīkāro veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:230: manaskāravikṣepaḥ samāpattyantaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya dhyānāntaraṃ vā saṃśrayataḥ pūrvasmāddhyutthānato veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:239: kuśalā(di)bhāvavacanaṃ na tvavaśyaṃ mohātmaka iti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:247: anabhipretaṃ karaṇaṃ parairbalādavaṣṭabhya kāryamāṇasya kleśābhibhavādvā yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:253: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vetyanabhyūhābhyūhāvasthāyāṃ yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:254: [Abhidh-s-bh_9] paryeṣaṇākārā manaso 'bhijalpanā vitarkaḥ pratyavekṣaṇākārā manaso 'bhijalpanānuvicāra iti //
SA01abhsubhu:263: cittaviprayuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmadhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:271: prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samāgama iti prajñaptiriti prajñaptinirdeśaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:277: nirodha iti samāpatticittakṛtaḥ kālāntaramasthāvaracittacaittasamudācāranirodho āśrayasyāvasthāviśeṣo nirudhyate 'neneti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:280: ete ca samāpattī bhūmitaḥ manaskārato 'dhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeṣṭe āsaṃjñikaṃ manaskāravarjairebhireva /
SA01abhsubhu:283: sthitikālaniyama iyantaṃ kālamanenāsmin nikāyasabhāge 'vasthātavyaṃ varṣaśataṃ varṣasahasraṃ veti karmakṛtaḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:287: bāhyasyāpi rūpasya jātimattve nikāyasabhāgamātragrahaṇaṃ sattvasaṃtāne lakṣaṇaprajñaptijñāpanārtham /
SA01abhsubhu:288: bāhyaṃ hi rūpaṃ saṃvarttavivarttaprabhāvitamā dhyātmikāstu jātijarādiprabhāvitā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:290: ete ca jātyādayo na pratikṣaṇaṃ veditavyāḥ kiṃtarhi prabandhāvasthāsviti /
SA01abhsubhu:291: svabhāvādhivacanaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ devo manuṣya ityevamādi /
SA01abhsubhu:293: tadubhayāśrayeṣvi ti svabhāvaviśeṣādhivacanāśrayeṣvakṣareṣu a i u ityevamādiṣu /
SA01abhsubhu:297: paryāyākṣaraṇatāmupādāyeti yathā cakṣuścakṣurityetasmātparyāyādanyeṣvapi netrākṣinayanalocanādiṣu paryāyāntareṣu kṣarati,
SA01abhsubhu:299: naivaṃ a ityetadakṣaraṃ a ityetaṃ paryāyaṃ mukttvā paryāyāntareṇa śakyate jñāpayitum,
SA01abhsubhu:302: prabandhānupacchede pravṛttivyavasthānamekasmin kṣaṇe vyavacchinne vā tadupacārābhāvāt hetuphalanānātvamiṣṭasya phalasya sucaritamaniṣṭasya duścaritamityevamādi /
SA01abhsubhu:307: hetuphalasya prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yattatra hetuphalamutpannaniruddhaṃ so 'tītaḥ kāla iti prajñapyate,
SA01abhsubhu:313: hetuphalapratyayānāṃ [Abhidh-s-bh_11] samavadhānaṃ tadyathā vijñānākhyasya hi hetuphalasyendriyāparibhedo vipayābhāsagamanaṃ tajjñānaṃ manaskārapratyupasthānaṃ ceti /
SA01abhsubhu:315: ityevamete cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmavasthāsu prajñapanātsarve prajñaptisanto veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:337: upāttamādi spaṣṭatvaṃ bījaṃ karma na yujyate /
SA01abhsubhu:350: api ca ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ sā jātirnopalabhyate yāvyākṛtavipākasaṃgṛhītā syāt /
SA01abhsubhu:353: tatra yena yenāśrayeṇa yadvijñānaṃ pravartate tadeva tenopāttaṃ syādavaśiṣṭasyānupāttateti na yujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:356: api ca punaḥ punarāśrayasyopādāna doṣaḥ prasajyate /
SA01abhsubhu:357: tathāhi cakṣurvijñānamekadā pravartate ekadā na pravarttate evamavaśiṣṭāni /
SA01abhsubhu:359: iti pūrvakarmapravarttamānapratyahetuto 'pi kuśalākuśalato 'pi tajjātyanupalaṃbhato 'pi pratiniyatāśrayato 'pi punaḥ punarupādānadoṣato 'pi na yujyate //
SA01abhsubhu:361: sa cetkaścidvadedyadyālaya vijñānamasti tena dvayoḥ vijñānayoḥ yugapatpravṛttirbhaviṣyati /
SA01abhsubhu:362: sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ - adoṣa eva bhavāndoṣasaṃjñī /
SA01abhsubhu:366: tathāhi tatra manaskāro 'pi nirviśiṣṭa indriyamapi viṣayo 'pi //
SA01abhsubhu:367: kena kāraṇenāsatyāṃ yugapadvijñānapravṛttau manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānasahānucarasya spaṣṭatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:368: tathāhi yasmin samaye 'tītamanubhūtaṃ viṣayaṃ samanusmarati tasmin samaye 'vispaṣṭo manovijñānapracāro bhavati na tu tathā vartamānaviṣayo manaḥpracāro 'vispaṣṭo bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:370: kena kāraṇena bījatvaṃ na saṃbhavati ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāmanyonyam /
SA01abhsubhu:381: na ca teṣāṃ tathā bījatvaṃ yujyate /
SA01abhsubhu:384: kena kāraṇenāsatyāṃ yugapadvijñānapravṛttau karma na saṃbhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:386: etā vijñaptayaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe yugapatpravartamānā upalabhyante /
SA01abhsubhu:387: na caikasya vijñānasyaikasmin kṣaṇe idamevaṃrūpaṃ vyatibhinnaṃ karma yujyate //
SA01abhsubhu:389_0: tathāhyekatyasya yoniśo vāyoniśo vā cintayato vānuvitarkayato vā samāhitacetaso vāsamāhitacetaso
SA01abhsubhu:389_1: vā ye kāye kāyānubhavā utpadyante 'nekavidhā bahunānāprakārāste na bhaveyurupalabhyante ca /
SA01abhsubhu:392: tathāhya saṃjñisamāpannasya vā nirodhasamāpannasya vā vijñānameva kāyādapakrāntaṃ syāt /
SA01abhsubhu:396: tathāhi cyavamānasya vijñāna mūrdhvadehaṃ vā śotikurvan vijahāti,
SA01abhsubhu:399: ato 'pyālayavijñānasyaiva dehopādāna kasya vigamāddehaśītatā upa[la]bhyate dehāpratisaṃvedanā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:402: mano nirvacanata ālaṃbanataḥ saṃprayogataḥ pravṛttikālataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:416: ananyathīma vatā sadaiva bhāvanāṃ nirātmatayā draṣṭavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:428: ākāśaṃ rūpābhāva iti rūpasyava viparyayeṇābhāvalakṣaṇo yo dharmo manovijñānaviṣayastadākāśam /
SA01abhsubhu:433: te 'pi śaśaviṣāṇādayo nāsyaiva vidyamānasya rūpasya viparyayeṇa,
SA01abhsubhu:438: yo nirodho na ca visaṃyoga ityanuśayāsamuddhātāt /
SA01abhsubhu:440: dvayamidaṃ prahātavyam - kleśāśca tadāśrayabhūtaṃ ca vastu veditam /
SA01abhsubhu:451: mana āyatanena sapta vijñānadhātava ityevaṃ sarvadharmāstrayo bhavanti //
SA01abhsubhu:453: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ dvitve sati kathaṃ dhātūnāṃ naikaviṃśatitvam /
SA01abhsubhu:454: yadyapi caiṣāṃ dvitvaṃ na tu dhātvantaratvam,
SA01abhsubhu:463: yathā dvayoścakṣuṣorunmiṣitayoḥ rūpagrahaṇaṃ spaṣṭaṃ bhavati na tathaikasminneveti /
SA01abhsubhu:464: tadyathā ekasminnapavarake dvayoḥ pradīpayorekaṃ prabhāpratānaṃ spaṣṭataraṃ dvau pradīpau niśritya varttate /
SA01abhsubhu:466: ekaikenendriyadvāreṇa vicitraviṣayapratyupasthāne tatprakāreṣu kiṃ krameṇa vijñānānyutpadyante āhosyidyugapadekam /
SA01abhsubhu:471: yathā svaprade śamavaṣṭabhya pradīpapratānavat śabdapratānasyotpādo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:472: yattvāsannatiraskṛtasya śabdasyāspaṣṭaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavati tacchabdasya pratighātitvādāvaraṇasauṣiryasvalpoktito veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:473: ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ kati vijñānāni savikalpakāni katyavikalpakāni /
SA01abhsubhu:476: tatra svabhāvavikalpaḥ pratyutpanneṣu saṃskāreṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yaḥ svalakṣaṇākāro vikalpaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:479: api khalu sapta vikalpāḥ ālaṃbane svarasavāho vikalpaḥ sanimitto 'nimittaḥ paryeṣakaḥ pratyavekṣakaḥ kliṣṭo 'kliṣṭaśca vikalpaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:483: animitto 'nāgataviṣayo manorathākāro vikalpaḥ śeṣā abhinirūpaṇāvikalpasvabhāvā veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:488: yadā rūpādiprativijñaptikaṃ vijñānaṃ tatkena kāraṇena cakṣurādivijñānamityucyate na rūpādibhijñānamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:494: tathāhi sati cakṣuṣi cakṣurvijñānamavaśyamutpadyate anandhānāmanandhato 'ndhakārasyāpi darśanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:499: tadyathā kāmalavyādhyupahatena [Abhidh-s-bh_17] cakṣuṣā nīlādirūpeṣvapi pītadarśanameva bhavatīti /
SA01abhsubhu:508: kiṃ tāvaccakṣū rūpāṇi paśyatīti veditavyamatha vijñānam /
SA01abhsubhu:512: api khalu ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ cakṣuṣo rūpadarśane prādhānyaṃ veditavyaṃ na vijñānasya /
SA01abhsubhu:525: etacca yathoktaṃ sarva vijñānasya na saṃbhavatīti /
SA01abhsubhu:527: yathā dhātuṣvāyataneṣu cāsaṃskṛtaṃ vyavasthāpitamevaṃ kasmānna skandheṣvapi vyavasthāpitam /
SA01abhsubhu:530: sa ca nityasya na saṃbhavatīti na skandheṣvasaṃskṛtavyavasthānam //
SA01abhsubhu:531: kena kāraṇena ta eva dharmā skandhadhātvāyatanamukhaiḥ pṛthagdeśitāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:533: tathāhi skandhanirdeśe ye rūpavijñāne samāsena nirdiṣṭe te dhātvāyataneṣvekādaśadhā /
SA01abhsubhu:534: saptadhā ca bhittvā vyāsena [Abhidh-s-bh_18] nirdiṣṭe yathāyogam /
SA01abhsubhu:535: ye tu tatra vedanādayo vyastāḥ te dhātvāyataneṣu dharmadhātvāyatanatvena samastā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:538: grahaṇāya dvārabhūtasya grāhyagrāhakamātrasya vyavasthānata āyatananirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:544: ārūpyopapannasya pṛthagjanasya cakṣurheturiti tataḥ pracyutya rūpiṇi dhātāvupapadyamānasya yasmādālayavijñānasaṃniviṣṭāccakṣurbījācca kṣurnirvartiṣyate,
SA01abhsubhu:546: kāyadhāturna kāya ārūpyopapannasya pṛthagjanasya yaḥ kāyadhāturityetadatra vaktavyam,
SA01abhsubhu:550: jāto bhūtaḥ nirvṛtti vṛddhi cādhikṛtya yathākramam //
SA01abhsubhu:555: yathā vedayate tathā saṃjānīta iti yathānubhavaṃ nimittodgrahaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:556: yathā saṃjānīte tathā cetayati yathāsaṃjñaṃ karmābhisaṃskaraṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:557: yathā cetayate tathā vijñānaṃ tatra tatropagaṃ bhavatīti yathābhisaṃskāraṃ viṣayeṣu gatyantareṣu ca vijñānapariṇāmāt //
SA01abhsubhu:559: yatra saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ceti sendriye kāye /
SA01abhsubhu:564: sā punaḥ apekṣātṛṣṇā abhinandanātṛṣṇā adhyavasānatṛṣṇā āmatṛṣṇā viṣayatṛṣṇā kāmatṛṣṇā samāpattitṛṣṇā duścaritaduḥkhatṛṣṇā sucaritasukhatṛṣṇā viprakṛṣṭatṛṣṇā sanikṛṣṭatṛṣṇā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:565: asyāḥ tṛṣṇāyā ālaṃbanatvena yathākramamatītādayaḥ prakārā yojitavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:567: utpannānutpannabhedato grāhakagrāhyabhedato bahirmukhāntarmukhabhedataḥ kliṣṭākliṣṭabhedato viprakṛṣṭasaṃnikṛṣṭabhedataśvātītādīni yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:575: tadyathā loke yena śarīrapradeśena bhāra uhyate tatra skandhopacāro dṛṣṭaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:580: sarvaprakāradharmasaṃgrahaṇena sūtrāntaranirdiṣṭānāṃ pṛthivīdhātvādīnāmanyeṣāmapi dhātūnāmeṣvevāṣṭādaśasu yathāyogaṃ saṃgrahaṇādveditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:582: rūpādānāṃ phenapiṇḍo pamatvamasato riktataḥ tucchato 'sārataśca [Abhidh-s-bh_20] khyānādveditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:583: eteṣāṃ punaḥ sūtrapadānāmartha ātmaśucisukhanityaviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa yathākramamanātmatāmupādāyetyevamādibhiḥ padarveditavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:584: kathaṃ kati kimarthibhiriti praśnatrayavyavasthāpanaṃ lakṣaṇavastusaṃmohayoḥ samāropasya ca prahāṇārtham /
SA01abhsubhu:585: tatra kathaṃ dravyasaditi dravyasato lakṣaṇanirdeśena tatsaṃmohaḥ prahīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:586: sarvāṇi dravyasantītyanena vastusaṃmohaḥ prahīyate ātmadravyābhiniveśatyājanārthamityanena samāropaḥ prahīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:588: abhilāpanirapekṣa indriyagocarastadyathā rūpaṃ vedanetyevamādikaṃ nāmnācitrayitvā yasyārthasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:595: yena saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ceti rāgādibhiścetasikaiḥ śraddhādibhiśceti veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:596: yā ca tatrāvastheti rūpacittacetasikāvasthāsu prajñaptāścittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:599: punastrayodaśavidhasya vijñānasya yo viṣayaḥ tajjñeyamanena pradarśitam /
SA01abhsubhu:600_0: tatpunaḥ śrutamayaṃ jñānaṃ cintāmayaṃ jñānaṃ laukikabhāvanāmayaṃ jñānaṃ paramārthajñānaṃ
SA01abhsubhu:600_1: paracittajñānaṃ dharmajñānam anvayajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ
SA01abhsubhu:608: vidūṣaṇāyāsamutthāpanāyānutpāde jñāne niṣṭhāyāṃ mahārtheṣu jñānaṃ tadvidūṣaṇajñānaṃ yāvanmahārthajñānamiti yojayitavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:618: sarvakālamaparicchinnākāratvāt citrākāravijñaptirekasyāneka ākāro vicitraśceti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvam /
SA01abhsubhu:619: sahabhāvavijñaptirekakālotpannāti vijñānāni kathaṃ pṛthagyathāsvaṃ viṣayaṃ paricchindantīti durvyavasthāpanātsūkṣmatvam /
SA01abhsubhu:621: vipakṣapratipakṣalaghuparivṛttivijñaptiḥ kathaṃ rāgādisamastabandhanaṃ cittaṃ tanmuhureva sakṛdvītarāgādikaṃ bhavatīti /
SA01abhsubhu:622: vāsanāvijñaptiḥ kathaṃ karmabhiḥ samudācaradbhiḥ cittaṃ vāsyate,
SA01abhsubhu:625: phaladānaṃ ca prati krameṇa vṛttilābha iti /
SA01abhsubhu:627_0: muktavijñaptiḥ kathamarhataścittaṃ paramaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ dharmatāprāptaṃ saṃsārocitasarvaprakārasāśravacaryā
SA01abhsubhu:627_1: samatikrāntamanenākāreṇa vartata iti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:628: draṣṭādigrahaṇena draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā svādayitā spraṣṭā vijñātā cetyeṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:636: tatra rūpīti rūpaṃ tasya dharmasyātmasvabhāvastasmādasau rūpī,
SA01abhsubhu:642: na tu yathā vedanādīnāṃ pūrvikā ca nāndo samudayaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:646: deśopadeśato 'muṣyāṃ diśīti vyavadeṣṭuṃ śakyatvāt deśagocarataḥ kasmiścitpradeśe sthitasyālaṃbanībhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:648: dvayasamagocarataḥ sattvadvayasya samamālaṃ vanībhāvānna tvevamarūpiṇo yathātmānubhavaṃ paraiḥ parigrahītumaśakyatvāditi /
SA01abhsubhu:653: vyābādhanataḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ pāṇyādisaṃsparśaiḥ śokādibhiśca yathāyogaṃ rūpaṇāt bādhanādityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:657: antarmukhato rūpāvacarasya rūpasya samāpatticittatṛṣṇāsaṃbhūtatvādata evāsya manomayatvaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:667: yathā rūvitadātmato 'pīti vistareṇa rūpītyuktaṃ tathā sanidarśanatadātmato 'pi sanidarśanaṃ vistareṇa yojayitavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:670: āvṛṇotītyetāvati vaktavye āvriyate ceti vacanaṃ prabhādirūpasya sapratighatvavyavasthāpanārtham /
SA01abhsubhu:671: taddhyāvriyata eva nāvṛṇotītyeṣā tasya jātireṣa svabhāva ityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:673: yanna samādhivaśavarti rūpamiti samādhivaśena vartamānasyāpratighatvāt samacittakadevatāvata /
SA01abhsubhu:674: prakopapadasthānaṃ yatrāśraya ālaṃbane vā dveṣa utpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:687: trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ saparivāramāryamārgamasaṃskṛtaṃ ca hitvā //
SA01abhsubhu:689: yāvanti sāsravāṇi tāvanti saraṇāṇītyevamādi tadānubaṃdhyārthena veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:696: kāmakāreṇa saṃmukhībhāvo vimukhībhāvaśca nāsaṃskṛtasya saṃbhavati nityatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:697: naivasaṃskṛtanāsaṃskṛtasya dvayāvyatirekādyaduktam - dvayamidaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ceti /
SA01abhsubhu:705: taccāsaṃskṛtaṃ ca sthāpayitvā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:719_1: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ pramodabāhulyādbhogeṣu vihāre ca svavaśavarttanādyathāyogam /
SA01abhsubhu:724: pratibimbavibhutvanidarśanotpannaṃ jñeyaṃ vastu sabhāgaṃ vaimokṣikaṃ tāthāgataṃ ca rūpaṃ yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:740: svalakṣaṇasya vartamānasya pratyekaṃ pratiniyatasya viṣayasya grāhakaṃ pañcendriyajam /
SA01abhsubhu:741: svasāmānyalakṣaṇasya [Abhidh-s-bh_26] sarvakālasya sarvasya viṣayasya grāhakaṃ ṣaṣṭhendriyajam //
SA01abhsubhu:744: yattāvadgrāhakaṃ grāhyamapi tat cakṣurādīnāmapi manovijñānena grāhyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:752: daśānāṃ dhātūnāmiti saptānāṃ vijñānadhātūnāṃ rūpaśabdadharmadhātūnāṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:769: atītanirdeśādhikāreṇedamapi jñāpyate - kimartha bhagavatātītādīnyeva trīṇi kathāvastūni vyavasthāpitāni na nirvāṇamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:777: ruciḥ saṃtiṣṭhata iti na kevalaṃ rucirevopapattiprātilambhikā kiṃ tarhi saha taiḥ śraddhādibhiriti /
SA01abhsubhu:778: kuśalasya bhāvanā sarve śrutamayādayaḥ kuśalā dharmāveditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:782: tadanyaḥ kleśopakleśo duścaritasamutthāpaka iti sa punaryaḥ kāmā[va]caro 'naiḥsargikaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:786: kudṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ yatrānaśanādibhiḥ puṇyārthino varārthinaśca kliśyanta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:797: akliṣṭākuśalacetaso yadyasya [Abhidh-s-bh_28] na kliṣṭaṃ nāpi kuśalaṃ ceto bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:802: adhigamaniṣyandato 'vyākṛtaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ sahajāmiti yaiścittacaitasikaiḥ vikrīḍanārthaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmemīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:809: saha samādhilābhāt prahāṇābhirativipakṣabhūtasya dauṣṭhu[lya]sya prahāṇāt pradeśavairāgyamastīti veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:824: satkāyavairāgyaṃ vā punaradhikṛtya śaikṣasyaikadeśavairāgyamaśaikṣasya sakalavairāgyaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:828: daśavairāgyāṇītyatra prātikūlyārtho vairāgyārtho veditavyo nāvaśyaṃ prahāṇārthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:829: uccataraṃ sthānaṃ prāptavato nihīnesthāne ityuccataraṃ nagaraśraiṣṭhayādisthānaṃ prāptavato grāmamahattarādisthāne nihīne /
SA01abhsubhu:830: bālānāṃ nirvāṇa iti tasya śāntatvājñānāt satkāyābhiṣvaṅgācca /
SA01abhsubhu:831: pratilabdhadarśanamārgasya traidhātuka iti saṃskāraduḥkhatāṃ parijñātavataḥ sarvasāsrava[va]stunirvedāt /
SA01abhsubhu:832: prakṛtyā vairāgyaṃ prakṛtivairāgyaṃ yāvatprahāṇena vairāgyaṃ prahāṇavairāgyamiti padavigrahajātirveditavyā //
SA01abhsubhu:833: mokṣaprayuktasya kuśalaṃ śaikṣamiti saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārāvasthāyāḥ prabhṛtimokṣārtha prayuktasya veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:841: śaikṣasya kliṣṭāvyākṛtamityatra kliṣṭamakuśalaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /
SA01abhsubhu:847: dṛṣṭisthānaṃ dṛṣṭisahabhuvo dharmāstadvījaṃ ca tathaiva vicikitsāsthānamapi veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:848: ye ca dṛṣṭau vipratipannāḥ kleśopakleśā iti ye dṛṣṭimukhena pravṛttā tadālaṃbanāśca rāgādayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:850: darśanaprahātavyāviparyayeṇa sāsravā iti parikalpitakliṣṭadṛṣṭayādikādanye sāsravā ityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:851: atra punaḥ sāsravagrahaṇena nirvedhabhāgīyānāmapi grahaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ dauṣṭhulyānubandhārthena /
SA01abhsubhu:863: na tu phalotpādanaṃ prati pratyayasya kācidīhetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:865: na hyanutpādikāraṇāt kiṃcidutpadyamānaṃ kārya siddhamiti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:866: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityevamādi samarthapratyayotpattitāmupādāya nirīhakatvānityatve 'pi sati na yataḥ kutaścit pratyayāt sarvameva phalamutpadyate,
SA01abhsubhu:869: yānyavidyādīni dvādaśāṅgāni vibhaktāni tānyeva punaḥ samasya catvāryaṅgāni bhavantyākṣepā ṅgādīni /
SA01abhsubhu:870: etāvacca pravṛttinirdeśe nirdeṣṭavyam yaduta hetukāle yenākṣipyate yaccākṣipyate phalakāle yenābhinirvartyate yaccābhinirvatyate tadetatsarvamebhiraṅgainirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:873: ākṣiptāṅgaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca,
SA01abhsubhu:874: tayā cittavāsanayā nāmarūpādīnā māyatyāṃ pūrvotarasaṃniśrayakrameṇābhinirvṛtaye bījapuṣṭitaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:876_1: sopādāne vijñāne sati maraṇāvasthāyāṃ phaladānaṃ prati chandarāgānurūpyāntarakarmavāsanābhimukhībhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:878: tena prakāreṇa karmāntaravāsanābhimukhye satyanyatarasmin gatiyonyādibhedabhinne nikāyasabhāge yathākṣipte nāmarūpādinirvṛtteḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:881: na tvevaṃ jarāyujāyāṃ yonau vinā nāmarūpādibhiḥ ṣaḍāyatanādīnāṃ saṃbhava ityeṣāṃ pṛthagaṅgīkaraṇaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:903: nāmarūpamātmabhāvaṃ sattvān grāhayati tannivṛttyā sattvānāṃ nikāyasabhāgāntarabha janāt /
SA01abhsubhu:919: upādānaṃ punarbhavādānāya sopādānaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ karoti,
SA01abhsubhu:930: jarāmaraṇaṃ punaḥpunarvayaḥ pariṇāmena jīvitapariṇāmena ca sattvān yojayati,
SA01abhsubhu:950: antareṇa eva kartāraṃ karma kriyā cāsti tatphalopabhogaścetyayamatra karmaphalāvipraṇāśo veditavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:963: na svayaṃ na parato dvividhakoṭipratikṣepe 'pi gambhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ syāt prāgeva yatra catasro 'pi koṭayaḥ pratikṣipyante,
SA01abhsubhu:976: parato vā ghoṣaṃ pratītyādhyātmaṃ ca yoniśo manaskāraṃ samyagdṛṣṭistato yāvatsarvāsravakṣaya iti /
SA01abhsubhu:981: jarāmaraṇaṃjarāmara[ṇa]samudayo [jarāmaraṇanirodho] jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminī pratipaditi satyavyavasthānamadhikṛtya pratilomanirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:983: kasminnasati na jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati kasya nirodhājjarāmaraṇanirodha iti pratilomanirdeśataḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:984: hetupratyaya ālayavijñānaṃ kuśalavāsanā ca sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:991: api khalu svabhāvato 'pītyevamādinā ṣaḍḍhetavo hetupratyaya iti darśayati /
SA01abhsubhu:1018: tadyathā bhūtāni bhautikaṃ ceti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ na tvavaśyaṃ sarvatra saṃghāte catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavanti rūpādikaṃ vā bhautikam /
SA01abhsubhu:1019: ityato yadyatrāsti tattena sahotpadyate nānyonyaṃ vineti //
SA01abhsubhu:1026: ye dharmāḥ sahabhāvenālaṃbanaṃ pratipadyante nānyatama vaikalyena te saṃpratipattitaḥ saṃprayuktakaheturvyavasthāpyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1030: yā aparānte uttarottarā puṣṭataratamā pravṛttiriti taiḥ paripoṣitabījānāṃ tadanvayānāmanāgate kāle viśiṣṭotpattito draṣṭavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1032_0: sarvatragaheturna kevalaṃ sadṛśasyaiva puṣṭaye kiṃ tarhi yasya kasyacidrāgādeḥ kleśasyābhyāsena
SA01abhsubhu:1035: nairantaryasamanantarato 'pīti nāvaśyaṃ kṣaṇanairantarya kiṃtarhi cittāntaranairantaryamapyatra nairantarya draṣṭavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1036: itarathā hyacittikasamāpattau vyutthānacittasya samāpatticittaṃ na samanantarapratyayaḥ syāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1038: tasmādekasmin saṃtāne paścimasya cittasya pūrvakaṃ cittaṃ cittāntareṇānantaritaṃ [Abhidh-s-bh_38] samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1040: sabhāgavisabhāgacittacaittotpattisama[na]ntarato 'pīti kuśalāḥ cittacettāḥ kuśalānāṃ sabhāgānāmakuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ ca visabhāgānāmanantarotpannānāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1042: tadyathā kāmāvacarā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarānāsravāṇāṃ cānantarotpannānāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1043: evaṃ rūpāvacarādayo 'pi pṛthagpṛthagrūpāvacarādonāṃ kāmāvacarādīnāṃ cā[na]ntarotpannānāmiti yojayitavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:1044: kiṃ khalu sarvasya cintasyānantaraṃ sarva cittamutpadyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1047: avaitasya cittasyānantaramidaṃ cedaṃ ca cittamutpadyata ityucyamāne bahuvaktavyaṃ jāyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1049_0: tadyathā daśabhirbalaiścittasyotpādo veditavyaḥ - paricayabalena chandabalena prayogabalena
SA01abhsubhu:1056: adhimātreṇa yatheṣṭaṃ sarvāṇi vā vyutkrāmyānulomaṃ pratilomaṃ ca samāpattirveditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1057: chandabalena dvitīyadhyānalābhī prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpanno yadyākāṃkṣati dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ vyutthānacittamāmukhīkarotyatha nā kāṃkṣati kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalamanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ vā /
SA01abhsubhu:1059: prayogabalena kāmāvacarasya kuśalasyavānantaraṃ tatprathamato rūpāvacaraṃ cittamutpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1061: maulasya kuśalasyānantaraṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpannakamityevamādi vistareṇa yāvadbhavāgrāt veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1064_0: tadvirodhi kleśasaṃprayuktasya punaścittasya hetvādibhiśca turbhirbalaiḥ samudācāro
SA01abhsubhu:1065: viṣayabalena yadi rāgādyutpatyanukūlaḥ śubhādinimittaḥ prabhāvotkaṭaviṣaya ābhāsasamāgato bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:1068: pratisaṃdhibalena nava maraṇacittānyātmabhāvatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktāni triṣu dhātuṣupratyekaṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarāṇi /
SA01abhsubhu:1069: tatra kāmadhātoścyutvā kāmadhātāveva pratisaṃdhi vadhnataḥ kāmāvacaramātmabhāvatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ maraṇacittaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1071: tathā rūpārūpyadhātubhyāṃ cyutvā tatra vānyatra votpadyamānasya ṣaṭcittāni yojayitavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1075: āryāṇāmapyavītarāgāṇāṃ maraṇakāle yāvadaspaṣṭasaṃjñāvasthāṃ na gacchati tāvadasau tṛṣṇā samudācarati /
SA01abhsubhu:1077: vītarāgāṇāṃ tvāryāṇāṃ pratipakṣasya valīyastvānnaivāsau samudācaratyaprahīṇāpi satī /
SA01abhsubhu:1084: bodhisattvānāṃ tu praṇidhānabalenopapadyamānānāṃ maraṇacittādikamekāntena sarva kuśalaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1093: savastukaviṣayālaṃbanato dṛṣṭimasmimānaṃ tatsaṃprayuktāṃśca dharmān sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣāmālaṃbanam /
SA01abhsubhu:1103: ālaṃbanapratyaye viniścayaḥ - lakṣaṇato 'pi prabhedato 'pi sthitito 'pi parijñānato 'pi prahāṇato 'pyālavanavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:1118: sabhāgamālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā kuśalādīnāṃ kuśalādīni svabhūmikānāṃ ca svabhūmikaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ ca sāsravamanāsravāṇāṃ cānāsravam /
SA01abhsubhu:1132: tattvamālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā tathatā ṣoḍaśānāṃ cākārāṇāṃ satyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1144: trividhaṃ jñānaṃ vaśitājñānaṃ vipaśyanājñāna nirvikalpajñānaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:1162: śrāvakayānāśrayaparivṛttyā skandhadhātvāyatanālaṃbanebhyo vimokṣo na tu teṣu vibhutvalābhaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1170: paurāṇaṃ sāsravakarma vipākasyetyevamādi sahabhāvādhipatitaḥ cittaṃ caitasānām,
SA01abhsubhu:1187: vijñānasahitasya vijñānasādṛśyenendriyasya viṣayeṣu prabandhenotpatteḥ vijñānavṛttisādṛśyārthena tadindriyaṃ sabhāgamityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1207: duḥkhā vedanā duḥkhātmikā satī svenaiva lakṣaṇena duḥkhaduḥkhatāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1209: sukhāyā vedanāyāstadvedanīyānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ vipariṇāmena daurmanasyotpādāt tadvipariṇatirvipariṇāmaduḥkhatā /
SA01abhsubhu:1210: tatra cānunayena cittasya vipariṇamanaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1226: ālayavijñānāttadanyattu cakṣurādikaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhādikaṃ ca tadvipākrajamityākhyāṃ labhate tato jātamiti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:1250: tatra parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ skandhādīnyadhiṣṭhāyāvidyamāna ātmādisvabhāvo yaḥ parikalpitaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1263: lakṣaṇasaṃgraheṇa rūpaskandho rūpaskandhenaiva saṃgṛhīto vistareṇa yāvaddharmāyatanaṃ dharmāyata[ne]naiva /
SA01abhsubhu:1266: jātisaṃgraheṇa skandhaiḥ rāśyādyarthayuktā rūpādayaḥ sarve saṃgṛhītā vilakṣaṇā apyanyonyaṃ svalakṣaṇenaikajātīyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1268: avasthāsaṃgraheṇa skandhā ekajātīyā api sukhādyavasthāṃ niyamayya sukhāvasthāḥ sukhāvasthaireva saṃgṛhītā na duḥkhādyavasthaiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1270: yathā skandhā evaṃ dhātava āyatanāni ca /
SA01abhsubhu:1271: sahāyasaṃgraheṇa rūpaskandhaḥ saha tadāśritairvedanādibhiḥ sahāyairgṛhyamāṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1272: evaṃ vedanādayāpi pratyekaṃ saparivārā gṛhyamāṇāḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA01abhsubhu:1273: tathā dhātava āyatanāni ca saparivārāṇi pratyekaṃ sarvardhātubhirāyataneśca saṃgṛhītāni veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1278: evaṃ kṛtvā yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ sūtrāntareṣu teṣāmanyatamasaṃgraha ekadeśasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1282: evaṃ kṛtvā yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaṃḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ sūtrāntareṣu teṣāmaśeṣataḥ saṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1284: yathāyogamevaṃ dhātavaḥ skandhāyatanarāyatanāni skandhadhātubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāni [iti] vistareṇāvagantavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:1289: araṇyasaṃgṛhītā mṛgā iti loke ucyate tathehāpi cakṣurādibhiḥ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1290: nibandhasaṃgraho yathā rajjvādinā kāṣṭhabhārādikasya tathā kāyena cakṣurādonāmindriyāṇām /
SA01abhsubhu:1291: tulyārthasaṃgraho yathā samānasarvaprayojanānāṃ visrambhiṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ parasparaṃ tarthakālaṃbanapravṛttānāṃ saṃprayuktānāmānyonyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1292: upādānasaṃgraho yathā svāminā ātmīyataḥ parigrahītādīnā dāsādīnāṃ tathālayavijñānenātmabhāvasya /
SA01abhsubhu:1293: avisārasaṃgraho yathā ghaṭenodakasya tathā samādhinā tadanyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānām /
SA01abhsubhu:1294: abhisaṃkṣepa[saṃ]graho yathā samudreṇa nadīnāṃ tathā rūpaskandhena cakṣurādonāmiti /
SA01abhsubhu:1296: paramāṇudeśe sarveṣāṃ deśināmityekaparamāṇuparyāpannānāṃ rūpādīnāmavinirbhāgaḥ samānadeśatvena veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1297: paramāṇorūrdhva sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ miśrībhāvaḥ tadyathā kaluṣe pānīye appṛthivīparamāṇūnāṃ paramparam /
SA01abhsubhu:1298: deśināmeva samudāyināmanyonyaṃ samavadhānaṃ tadyathā bhittau mṛtpiṇḍena mṛtpiṇḍāntarasya /
SA01abhsubhu:1301: saṃpratipattisaṃprayogaḥ parabhāvena na svabhāvena tadyathā cittaṃ cittāntareṇa na saṃprayujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1306: sarvatragaḥ saṃpratipattisaṃprayoga vedanādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ sarvāsvavasthāsveṣāṃ vinānyonyamabhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1307: ucitastadekatyānāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāmityekāntalaukikānāṃ kuśalānāmakuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /
SA01abhsubhu:1310: samanvāgamo lakṣaṇataḥ pūrvavattadyathā kuśalādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmācayāpacaye prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samanvāgama iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1311: bījasamanvāgama iti kāmadhātau jātau bhūtastraidhātukaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ samanvāgata ityavītarāgaṃ pṛthagjanamadhikṛtyaitadvaiditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1312: vītarāgastu tatrordhvaṃ vā jāto yato bhūmervītarāgastadbhūmikairasamanvāgataḥ samanvāgataśca,
SA01abhsubhu:1316: yasya yasya prakārasya pratipakṣa utpanna iti bhāvanāprahātavyasyādhimātrādeḥ kleśasya /
SA01abhsubhu:1318: vaśitāsamanvāgamaḥ prāyogikānāṃ kuśalānāmiti śrutamayādīnāṃ satyapi bīje tadabhyāsakṛtāṃ tajjanmikīṃ bījapuṣṭimantareṇa saṃmukhīkartumaśakyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1323: yasyaivaṃ tathatāyāṃ kleśadauṣṭhulyaṃ saṃniviṣṭaṃ bhavati tatsati pratipakṣānukūlapratyayalābhe śakyate samuddhātayitum,
SA01abhsubhu:1331: yaśca sattvaloko yaśca bhājanalokaḥ karmakleśajanitaḥ karmakleśādhipateya ityābhyāṃ tayoḥ sattvabhājanalokayorduḥkhatvakāraṇaṃ jñāpayati //
SA01abhsubhu:1332: api khalu jātirduḥkhamityevamādi pūrvaṃ samasya duḥkhasatyalakṣaṇaṃ vyutpādyādhunā duḥkhasatyamārabhya sūtroktasya nirdeśasyārtha vibhaktumārabhate //
SA01abhsubhu:1333_0: jātirduḥkhaṃ saṃvādaduḥkhatāṃ tadanyadukhasvāśrayatāṃ copādāyeti mātuḥ kukṣāvāmapakvāśayayorantarāle
SA01abhsubhu:1335: ṣaṭ samānānyaṣṭau bhavanti vipariṇatidukhaṃ tridhā kṛtvā //
SA01abhsubhu:1346: tatpuna rasallakṣaṇaṃ yathā nāsti sarvadā duḥkhasatyamā[tmā]tmoyasvabhāvamiti yo 'rthaḥ so 'rtho 'nityaṃ duḥkhasatyamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:1350: viyogalakṣaṇaṃ tadavastheṣveva vastuṣu svabhāvavaśitvabhraṃśaḥ kvacitparaiḥ svīkaraṇamapi veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1360: prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānasthānāvasāne lokasaṃniveśe saṃvṛtte tadūrdhvaṃ yānyavaśiṣyante dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānasyānāntarāṇi tāni tāsāṃ śīrṣāṇi veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1363: taireva tu sarvairjāyamānaiḥ saha tāni vimānāni nirvartante cyavamānaiḥ saha [Abhidh-s-bh_51] tāni nirudhyanta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:1372: tasminnāyatane upapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmaṇa upayuktatvādabhāvādvā tatra bhūyo 'nutpattito veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:1382: saṃskārānityatāṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ ca saṃdhāyoktam - mayā yatkiṃcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyayamaduḥkhāsukhasya sukhasya ca veditasya duḥkha vacane 'bhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1383: duḥkhasya tu veditasya duḥkhatvena prasiddhatvālloke na tatra punarabhisaṃdhirucyata iti /
SA01abhsubhu:1384: yeṣu cānityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ prajñāyate [teṣām] anityatvāt duḥkhamityabhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1387: teṣāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ nityakālaṃ tadrahitaprakṛtikalakṣaṇasya [Abhidh-s-bh_52] nairātmyasya bhāvastadubhayaṃ śūnyatetyucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1391: tasya yena yena prakāreṇa parikalpyate tena tena prakāreṇābhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1395: kṣaṇikalakṣaṇā tu na prasiddhā sarvasaṃskārāṇāmataḥ sā prasādhayitavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1396: tatra cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ loke prasiddhamataḥ tenāprasiddhaṃ rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasādhyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1402: tathāhi kāyaḥ savijñānaka eva samudāgacchati vijñānāpakrāntyā ca pūtībhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:1405: cittasya hi [vi]kāreṇa kāyasya vikāro dṛśyate sukhaduḥkharāgadveṣādyavasthāsu /
SA01abhsubhu:1406: ataḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikāriṇaścetaso 'nuvidhānāt kāyasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ siddham /
SA01abhsubhu:1408: cittasya hi sendriyaḥ kāya āśrayaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1409: yasya ca ya utpatyāśrayo nāsau svavināśamantareṇa tasyāśrayībhavandṛṣṭaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1415: ye hetavo ye pratyayāḥ rūpasyātpādāya te 'pyanityāḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1416: anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityaṃ bhaviṣyatīti sūtrapadānusāreṇa /
SA01abhsubhu:1418: prabhāvaviśiṣṭasya ca cittasya [Abhidh-s-bh_53] rūpaṃ vaśe vartate,
SA01abhsubhu:1422: na hi pratikṣaṇaprakṛtivikāritāmantareṇākasmiko rūpasyānte vikāro yuktaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1427: ataḥ pratyayāntaranirapekṣo 'vaśyaṃbhāvī vināśa utpannamātrasyaiva bhāvasya na bhavati paścādbhatīti [na] kiṃcidviśeṣaṇamasti /
SA01abhsubhu:1434: asti sarvabhūtikaḥ sa evārdra uṣṇaśca mṛtpiṇḍo gamanāvasthāyāmiti /
SA01abhsubhu:1442: itya[nya]trāpi yadyatropalabhyate bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ vā tatra tadastīti veditavyaṃ nānyatra /
SA01abhsubhu:1445: buddhyā paryantabhedatastu paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ buddhyā yāvānavayapāpakarṣaparyantaḥ śakyate prabhettuṃ tāvatā paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ kriyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1446: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yadevaṃ niḥśarīro 'pi paramāṇurvyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1448: avayavaśo hi buddhyā bhidyamāne rūpe sarvametadekaṃ rūpamiti piṇḍasaṃjñā vigacchati,
SA01abhsubhu:1451: evaṃ hi buddhyā bhidyamānaṃ rūpaṃ na kiṃcidbhavatīti matvā rūpadravyasyāpariniṣpattiṃ praviśati,
SA01abhsubhu:1454_1: yathākramaṃ tadvipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ ca veditavyam saṃlikhitaṃ tadevotpannamokṣabhāgīyānām,
SA01abhsubhu:1464: paraṃ saptāhaṃ tiṣṭhatyantareṇa ca cyavate yadyupapattipratyayān labhate /
SA01abhsubhu:1465: atha na labhate saptāhātpareṇa cyutvā punarantarābhava eva nivartate /
SA01abhsubhu:1466: evaṃ yāva[t] saptakṛtvaḥ tataḥ pareṇa ekadā ca vyāvartate yadi tadavasthā syādyatropapattipratya[ya] /
SA01abhsubhu:1467: balavanta āmukhībhūtā bhavanti caturthadhyānalābhino 'rhattvābhimānino bhikṣostadbhūmikāntarābhavābhinirvṛttau mokṣāpavādi kamithyādṛṣṭipratilambhānnārakāntarābhavābhinirvṛttivat /
SA01abhsubhu:1470: sabhāgāṃśca sattvānpaśyati yaiḥ saha pūrva tatkuśalamakuśalaṃ vā caritaṃ bhavati taiḥ saha vartamānamātmānaṃ svapna iva saṃjānīte /
SA01abhsubhu:1472: tata ūrdhvamindriyābhinirvṛttiryathā pratītyasamutpāda iti nāmarūpādyānupūrvyā / yathoktam -
SA01abhsubhu:1480: kleśāḥ kleśādhipateyaṃ ca karma iti sāsravamityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1481: yadyevaṃ kimartha bhagavatā tṛṣṇaiva samudayanirdeśe nirdiṣṭā /
SA01abhsubhu:1495: ālayavijñānaṃ viśeṣeṇa saṃskāraduḥkhatāvasthaṃ tatra cātmasaṃmohasukhena tṛṣṇā pravṛttā veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1506: dṛṣṭeḥ prañcākāro bhedaḥ - satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśa iti //
SA01abhsubhu:1509: sā punaḥ ṣaḍākārā tadyathā vikṣepāpraśāntatā viparyāsāpraśāntatā auddhatyāpraśāntatā styānamiddhāpraśāntatā pramādāpraśāntatālajjāpraśāntatā ca //
SA01abhsubhu:1512: tatra cāyo niśomanaskāraḥ pratyavasthito bhavatīti tasminviṣaye śubhanimittādyudgrāhako rāgādyutpattyanukūlaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:1513: avidyā dṛṣṭivicikitsā ūrdhvabhūmyālaṃbanā api santi na punarāsāṃ sā bhūmiḥ sākṣādālaṃbanaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā svabhūmiḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1517: na hi parabhūmikān saṃskārānahamityabhiniviśamāno dṛṣṭa iti /
SA01abhsubhu:1522: tat parikalpitaṃ tvasyālaṃbanamiti vaktavye tatparikalpastvasyālaṃbanamiti vacanam,
SA01abhsubhu:1529: pratigho mānena dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1530: na hi yo yatra vastuni pratihatastena sa unnatiṃ gacchati tadvā saṃtīrayituṃ śaknotīti,
SA01abhsubhu:1532: krodhādaya anyonyaṃ na saṃprayujyanta iti viruddhā viruddhairna saṃ[pra]yujyante /
SA01abhsubhu:1539: yadyena prakāreṇa yasmin vastuni saṃprayojayati tannirdeśena saṃyojananirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1549: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena saṃprayukto mithyāni saraṇaṃ paryeṣata ityaha mokṣo mama mokṣo muktaśca nityo bhaviṣyāsyucchetsyāmi veti,
SA01abhsubhu:1552: āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ hitvā satkāyadṛṣṭayā tatpūrvakeṇa ca śīlavratena śuddhipratyayanāt //
SA01abhsubhu:1554: bāhyena hi bandhanena baddho dvayaṃ na labhate - gantuṃ ca na labhate,
SA01abhsubhu:1559: mithyā mokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ ca santīrayantīti yathākramaṃ tisṛbhirdṛṣṭibhirdvābhyāṃ ca parāmarśābhyāṃ yathā saṃyojaneṣūktamiti //
SA01abhsubhu:1561: ṣaḍ rāgādīn kleśān sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ kliṣṭaścaitasikaḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ krodhādiko veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1562: kuśalapakṣāntarāyāya yogināṃ punaḥpunarudvegena cittaṃ paryavanahyantīti paryavasthānāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1563: kuśalapakṣaḥ punaryathākālaṃ śamathapragrahopekṣānimittabhāvanā tatsaṃniśrayaśca brahmacaryādiśuddhisaṃgṛhītaṃ śīlam /
SA01abhsubhu:1582: abhidhyādayaḥ kāyagranthā iti na rūpakāyasyaite granthā veditavyāḥ kiṃtarhi samāhitacittasvabhāvasya kāyasya parigranthārthena granthāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1583: pṛthagdṛṣṭisaṃniśrayeṇedameva satyaṃ moghamanyadityabhiniviśya jñeyaṃ saṃtīrayatāmayoniśo jñeyasaṃtīraṇahetoḥ cittaṃ vikṣipyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1586: kuśalapakṣasyāsaṃprakhyānāya cittaṃ nivṛṇvantīti nivaraṇāni kuśalapravṛtterantarāyaṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1598: punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre jātijarāmaraṇayogena nidhnantīti nighāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:1606: mithyādharmābhiniveśahetoḥ viparītadarśino mohena duścaritaṃ caranti yājñikādaya iti //
SA01abhsubhu:1609: ayoniśonimittamanuvyañjanaṃ ca grāhayitvā kāyaṃ cittaṃ ca paridahantīti paridāhāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:1610: rūpādike vastuni ratyadhyavasānaṃ kārayitvā tadvipariṇāme śokādibhiḥ sattvānāyāsantītyu pāyāsāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:1620: rāgo viṣaye dṛṣṭau ca vipratipanna iti bhāvanāprahātavyo darśanaprahātavyaśca yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:1621: śubhatāmātrālaṃbanatvādrāgasya yo 'pi sattveṣu rāgaḥ so 'pi viṣayamukhenaiva vipratipanno veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1622: evaṃ pratikūlamātrālaṃbanatvāt pratighasya sattveṣvapi pravartamāno viṣayamukhenaiva vipratipanno veditavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:1623: mānaḥ sattveṣu dṛṣṭau ca [vi]pratipannaḥ hīnādasmi śreyānityevamādyākārapravṛttatvātsatveṣu vipratipanno veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1625: śīlavrataparāmarśādiḥ dṛṣṭau vipratipannaḥ dṛṣṭidoṣeṇaiva śīlavratasya śuddhitaḥ parāmarśanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1630: nirodhe mārge cottrāsasaṃjananato vipratipannāḥ kleśavaśātsaṃsāre 'bhiratasya vyavadānataḥ prapātasaṃjñātrāsāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1631: viparītakalpanataśca nirodhe mārge ca vipratipannā draṣṭavyāḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1640: sarva upekṣayā pūrvavat sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ na saṃprayujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1649: yā parivṛttāśrayasya parivṛttivijñānāśritā cittatuṣṭiḥ cittaudvilyaṃ cittaharṣaḥ cittakalpatā sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatam /
SA01abhsubhu:1651: yatparivṛttāśrayasyālayavijñānāśrita āśrayānugrahata āśrayahlādaḥ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:1653: sukhā vedanā prathamadvitīyayordhyānayorutpadyamānā yena cittacaitakalāpena saṃprayujyate taṃ ca harṣākāreṇa prīṇayati,
SA01abhsubhu:1655: atastadubhayakṛtyakaratvādubhayathaivāsyā vyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ prītiḥ sukhaṃ ceti /
SA01abhsubhu:1656: tasmāttayā saṃprayujyamāno mānaḥ sukhena saumanasyena ca saṃprayujyata ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1657: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kāmadhātau daurmanasyena saumanasyena ca saṃprayujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1663: rūpadhātau vicikitsottaradhyāyināmapi prītisukhaṃ samādhivalādhānenānuvartata eveti tatra sukhasaumanasyābhyāmapi saṃprayujyate //
SA01abhsubhu:1664: āveṇikāyā apyavidyāyā eṣa eva nayo draṣṭavyaḥ sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ saṃprayogāsaṃprayogamārabhya //
SA01abhsubhu:1670: kāmadhatau daśa dukhadarśanaprahātavyā iti ye tatra tannidānapadasthānato vipratipannāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1671: evaṃ samudayādiṣu yathāyogaṃ vipratipannāstaddarśanaprahātavyā iti veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1672: kiṃ khalu ye yadālaṃbanāste tatra [Abhidh-s-bh_62] vipratipannā iti veditavyāḥ /

SA01abhsubhu:1681: yayā nirvāṇāt pratyudāvartate mānasaṃ paritrasanamupādāyātha kastarhi me ātmeti /

SA01abhsubhu:2212: tatra lakṣaṇapratisavedinā prahātavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ ca samyakparijñāya prahāṇāya prāptaye ca cittaṃ praṇighatte /
SA01abhsubhu:2218: prayoganiṣṭhāphalena eṣāṃ manaskārāṇāṃ subhāvitānāṃ bhāvanāphalaṃ pratyanubhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:2219: yathā prathamadhyānasamāpattaye sapta manaskārā evaṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattaye yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2220: audārikalakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvāsvadhobhūmiṣu yāvadākiṃcanyāyatanāt samāsena dvividhaṃ veditavyam - duḥkhataravihāritāpraśāntavihāritayā,
SA01abhsubhu:2225: tadyathā brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaṃ ityevamādi yathāpūrvamuktam /
SA01abhsubhu:2230: tathāhi yāvataḥ prathamadhyānasaṃgṛhītān samādhīn buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāśca mahāprabhāvaprāptāḥ samāpadyante,
SA01abhsubhu:2231: teṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhāśca nāmānyapi na jānanti /
SA01abhsubhu:2238: lokottaramārgo bhāvanāmārge 'ṣṭau duḥkhā[didharmā]nvayajñānāni yathā darśanamārge nirdiṣṭāni /
SA01abhsubhu:2242: kutaḥ punaretat jñāyate naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatane āryamārgo nāstīti /
SA01abhsubhu:2247: pūrvotpāditāyāḥ paścātsaṃmukhobhāvo manuṣyeṣu vā tasminneva janmani rūpadhātau vā upapadya /
SA01abhsubhu:2250: ata evātra catuṣkoṭikaṃ bhavati - yo rūpavītarāgaḥ sarvaḥ sa ārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā,
SA01abhsubhu:2251: yo [Abhidh-s-bh_82] vā ārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā sarvaḥ sa rūpavītarāga iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2253: dvitīyā koṭiḥ - caturthadhyānalābhī ārya āryopapattyānarthī prahāṇamārgaṃ nirākṛtya viśeṣamārgaṃ niśrityārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā /
SA01abhsubhu:2254: tṛtīyā koṭiḥ - sa eva vairāgyārthī prahāṇamārgaṃ niśrityārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā /
SA01abhsubhu:2257: śāntena vihāreṇa vihartukāmā āryā manuṣyeṣvenāmabhinirhṛtya saṃmukhīkurvanti /
SA01abhsubhu:2258: ārūpyeṣu tūpapannāste 'prayatnenaiva vaipākikaiḥ paramaśāntaiḥ vimokṣavihārairviharantītyatastatsaṃmukhīkaraṇārthaṃ na punaḥ prayatnamārabhanta iti //
SA01abhsubhu:2259: mṛdumadhyādhimātro mārgaḥ pratyekaṃ punaḥ mṛdvādibhistribhiḥ prakārairbhittvā navaprakāro vyavasthāpyate,
SA01abhsubhu:2261: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ mṛdumṛdunā mārgeṇādhimātraḥ kleśaḥ prahīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2262: sa hyatyarthaḥ vipannahrīvyapannāpyālajjinaḥ saṃtāne samudācarati sūpalakṣaścāsau suparicchedastasmādasau sthūlamalavadalpenāpi pratipakṣeṇāpanīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2263_0: yastvayaṃ duṣparicchedasamudācāraḥ sūkṣmalīnaḥ saṃtāne mṛdumṛdukleśaḥ sūkṣmamalavanmahatā
SA01abhsubhu:2264_1: dauṣṭhulyāṅgasyāpagamātkrameṇāśrayaḥ parivartate sa bhāvanāmārge prayogamārge ityucyate //
SA01abhsubhu:2265: yasya tvanantaraṃ tatprakārakleśajātitatpakṣadauṣṭhulyāvaśeṣāpagamāttena dauṣṭhulyena nirdauṭhulya āśrayaḥ parivartate sa ānantaryamārgaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:2270: pūrvacintitādhigatadharmapratyavekṣaṇāvihāreṇa vā viharataḥ samāpattyantaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya yo mārgaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2271: punarabhijñādīn vaiśeṣikān guṇānabhinirharatastairvā viharato yo mārgaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:2272: ityevaṃ bhāvanāmārga vistareṇa nirdiśya tadanuṣaṃgeṇa mārgabhāvanā varṇyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2282: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ - mārga utpadyamānaḥ svāṃ vāsanāṃ sthāpayati[sā]dhāsanā pratilambhabhāvanā,
SA01abhsubhu:2287: punaḥ pratipakṣasya vidūṣaṇādikaḥ caturvidhaḥ prabhedo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2330: punarbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pañcabhiḥ prakāraiḥ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam - ālambanataḥ svabhāvataḥ sahāyato bhāvanāto bhāvanāphalataśca //
SA01abhsubhu:2331: tatra smṛtyupasthānānāmālaṃbanaṃ yathākramaṃ kāyo vedanā cittaṃ dharmāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2333_0: yasmādviparyastabuddhayo [Abhidh-s-bh_85] bālāḥ prāyeṇa sendriyaṃ kāyamāśritya sukhādimupabhuñjānā
SA01abhsubhu:2333_1: upalabdhalakṣaṇā ātmarāgādibhiḥ śraddhādibhiśca saṃkliśyante vyavadāyante ceti vikalpayantyata
SA01abhsubhu:2346: kāye kāyasya sādṛśyena paśyanā kāye kāyānupaśyanā,
SA01abhsubhu:2348: adhyātmaṃ vedanādayo 'dhyātmaṃ kāyamupādāyotpannāḥ cakṣurādyālaṃbanatayā svāśrayotpannanatayā vā /
SA01abhsubhu:2355: alpamātrasaṃtuṣṭiḥ alaṃ me tāvatā kuśalapakṣeṇeti prativāraṇam /
SA01abhsubhu:2366: tathāhi tatpratipakṣabhūtā prasrabdhiḥ kāya eva viśeṣeṇotpadyata iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2370: nirātmakaṃ vijñānamātraṃ na bhaviṣyatīti paśyata ātmocchedāśaṅkāmukhena nirvāṇottrāsābhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2383: yadā śamathādinimittamanaskāreṇa nirapekṣālaṃbanaṃ kevalaṃ pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati tadā vyāyaccjhata ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2384: yadā tulayopakleśe utpanne tadapakarṣaṇārtha prasadanīyādimanaskāraiḥ cittamunnāmayati,
SA01abhsubhu:2385: [Abhidh-s-bh_87] auddhatyopakleśe cotpanne pratyāsaṃkṣepamukhena cittaṃ dhārayati tadā vīryamārabhata ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2394: chandasamādhiryat satkṛtyaprayogamāgamya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratāṃ tīvreṇa chandena tīvreṇādareṇa prayogaḥ satkṛtyaprayoga iti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:2396: tadvīryamityucyate yannityaṃ prayujyata eva na kadācinna prayujyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2397: cittasamādhiryatpūrvajanmāntare samādhibhāvanāmāgamyatatparipuṣṭabījatvāccittasya svarasena samādhyanukūlapariṇāme sati spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām /
SA01abhsubhu:2398: api khalu ṛddhipādābhinirhārayornidarśanārthameva samyakprahāṇabhāvanāyāṃ chandaṃ janayatītyevamādinirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2399: cittaṃ pradadhāti pragṛhṇātītyeṣā cātra pāṭhānupūrvī veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:2400: tatra cittasamādhiryaccitaṃ pradadhat spṛśatīti pratyātmaṃ cittameva cittaṃ dhārayan śamayannabhisaṃkṣipannadhigacchatītyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2407: tathāhi yo yenārthī bhavati tatprāptyartha vyāyacchate /
SA01abhsubhu:2423: etacca yathā kramamadhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā - naca me chando 'tilīno bhaviṣyati,
SA01abhsubhu:2427: vivṛtena cetasāparyavanaddhena saprabhāsasahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi na ca me 'ndhakārāyattatvaṃ bhaviṣyati cetasa iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2431: phalaṃ tadādhipatyādacireṇa kālena darśanamārgasyotpādaḥ tasminneva ca kāle nirvedhabhāgīyabhajanaṃ ca saṃtānasya //
SA01abhsubhu:2434: tathāhyeṣāṃ tacca yathoktam - āśradvyādivipakṣanirlekhaścādhika ityata evaiṣāṃ tulyānāmālaṃbanasvabhāvādikānāmapyanavamṛdyatārthaviśeṣeṇa bodhipakṣāntaratvam //
SA01abhsubhu:2452: bhāvanā smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritamityevamādirebhiḥ caturbhiḥ padairyathākramaṃ catuḥsatyālaṃbanā bodhyaṅgabhāvanā paridīpitā /
SA01abhsubhu:2453: tathāhi duḥkhaṃ duḥkhata ālaṃbamānasya tadvivekānveṣaṇādduḥkhālaṃbanaṃ vivekaniśritamityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2454: tṛṣṇālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ duḥkhasamudayata ālaṃbamānasya tadvirāgānveṣaṇāttadālaṃbanaṃ virāganiśritam /
SA01abhsubhu:2461: mārgāṅgānāmālaṃbanaṃ darśanamārgāduttarakālaṃ saiva yathādṛṣṭānāṃ satyānāṃ yathābhūtatā /
SA01abhsubhu:2470: samyakkarmāntenābhikramapratikramādiṣu saṃpannacāritratayā śīlaviśuddhiḥ samyagājīvena yathānujñaṃ dharmeṇa cīvarādiparyeṣaṇādājīvaviśuddhiriti /
SA01abhsubhu:2480: pratipadāṃ dharmapadānāṃ ca pūrvavadarthanirdeśo veditavyaḥ dukhā pratipadanāgamyārūpyaniśritā yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanāmāndhāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2485: tasya cittasyaivamādita upanibaddhasya calasyaudārikasya tasminnevālaṃbane saṃtatiyogena sūkṣmīkaraṇena cābhisaṃkṣepaḥ saṃsthāpanā /
SA01abhsubhu:2488: pūrvameva vikṣepanimitteṣu rūpādiṣvādīnavasaṃjñāmadhipati kṛtvā cittasya prasarādānaṃ damanam /
SA01abhsubhu:2494: tatra caritaviśodhanamālaṃbanaṃ kauśalyālaṃbanaṃ vā kleśaviśodhanaṃ vā yāvadbhāvikatayā [Abhidh-s-bh_91] vicinoti,
SA01abhsubhu:2498: api khalu [śamatha]vipaśyanāmāgamya catvāro mārgā iti catvāro mārgopadeśanāmadhikṛtya /
SA01abhsubhu:2499: tatra prathamaḥ śamathasya lābhitvādabhiniṣīdanneva cittaṃ sthāpayati yāvatsamādhatte,
SA01abhsubhu:2500: vipaśyānāyā alābhitvāttu samādhiṃ niśritya paścāttathāniṣaṇṇastān dharmānvicinoti yāvatparimīmāṃsāmāpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2504: śrutodgrahaṇamukhena vivaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti tatpūrvakaṃ ca śamathe /
SA01abhsubhu:2506: ajñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ prayogamārge nirvedhabhāgīyasaṃgṛhīte pañcadaśasu ca darśanamārgacittakṣaṇeṣu yadindriyam,
SA01abhsubhu:2517: ūrdhvabhūmike mārge saṃmukhībhāvena bhāvyamāne 'saṃmukhībhūtānyapyadhobhūmikāni kuśalamūlakāni [Abhidh-s-bh_92] bhāvanāṃ gacchanti,
SA01abhsubhu:2524: yataścakṣurādayo dharmāḥ sanāmābhiniveśāḥ punaḥ punaḥ pravartanta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2547: yathoktaṃ - "tasya cetovimukteḥ pāripūryā prajñāvimukteḥ pāripūryā kāyadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratiprasrabdheḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2548: smṛtyā samanvāgamahetorevamasya prathamaṃ dvāraṃ sudāntaṃ bhavati suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāṣitam,
SA01abhsubhu:2549: yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣvevaṃ yāvanmano vijñeyeṣu dharmeṣvi"ti //
SA01abhsubhu:2551: sa ca samādhirnirantarastatpravāharaya laukikena mārge ṇāntarākhaṇḍanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2555: etadarthapratibimbanārtha bhagavatoktam - tadyathā mahāśailaḥ parvato 'khaṇḍo 'cchidro 'śuṣira ekadhanaḥ susaṃvṛta iti //
SA01abhsubhu:2560: mārgāśrayaparivṛtiḥ pūrvaṃ laukiko mārgo 'bhisamayakāle lokottaratvena parivṛtaḥ śaikṣaścocyate sāvaśeṣakaraṇīyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2561: yadā tu nirhatāśeṣavipakṣo bhavati traidhātukavairāgyāttadāsya mārgasvabhāvasyāśrayasya paripūrṇā parivṛttirvyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2563: kṣaye sati, viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānaṃ kṣayajñānametaduktaṃ bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:2564: niravaśeṣaṃ prakṣīṇe samudaye yajjñānaṃ tadavasthasya hetunirodhālaṃbanaṃ vā kṣayajñānamiti //
SA01abhsubhu:2565: tathānutpāde sati viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānamanutpādajñānam āyatyāṃ sarvasya duḥkhasyātyantamanutpattidharmatāyāṃ satyāṃ yajjñānamanyasatyālaṃbanamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:2581: viparyayeṇa lokottarāḥ supraviṣṭā nirāvaraṇāśca santo nirvikalpatayā laukikebhyo viśiṣyante /
SA01abhsubhu:2590: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatastamabhipretamartha vivṛtyaiva na deśayatītyāha daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyaṃstathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA01abhsubhu:2600: bhāvagamyo 'yaṃ dharma ityavagamya jātāsthasya tasmin dharme ādaramukhena śraddhādisaṃbhāraparipūraṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2606: abhiprāyārtha tīvreṇa yogena cintayitvā labdhavataḥ prāmodyaviśeṣādhigamāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2609: ata eva paṇḍitaḥ paṇḍita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
SA01abhsubhu:2613: udānaṃ yadāttamanaskenodāhṛtam tadyathā yadā ime prādurbhavanti dharmā ityevamādi //
SA01abhsubhu:2614: nidānaṃ yatkiṃcideva pudgalamuddiśya bhāṣitaṃ sotpattikaśikṣā prajñaptikabhāṣitaṃ vā,
SA01abhsubhu:2641: punaḥ sūtrapiṭakaṃ niśritya vineyāḥ śikṣātraye vyutpadyante,
SA01abhsubhu:2651: abhidharmaṃ niśritya parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaviniścayakṛtena dharmasaṃbhogena sparśavihāro bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:2663: śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ koṭirityevaṃ sarvāsūttarāsu saṃkhyāsvavaśyamanayoḥ daśaśatasaṃkhyayoranyataropaniṣadbhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:2664: ata ete eva samasya daśaśatānyeko dharmaskandho vyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2665: anayā ca gaṇanayā caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇyaṣṭau koṭyaḥ catvāriśacca lakṣā bhavanti //
SA01abhsubhu:2666: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2671: ākāraḥ, yān skandhādīnartha prakārānārabhya sā deśanā,
SA01abhsubhu:2674: tatra deśanākāle paravijñaptirāśrayo yo 'sāvucyate parato ghoṣata iti tata uttarakālaṃ smṛtirāśrayo yathāśrutamanusmṛtyābhyasanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2681: yāvadbhāvikatayā dharmāṇāmetāvanti sarvadharmavastuni yajjñeyavyavasthānam tadyathā skandhadhātvāyatanāni /
SA01abhsubhu:2683: tadyathā satyamukhena tānyeva skandhadhātvāyatanāni yathāsaṃbhavaṃ duḥkhatojñeyāni yāvanmārgataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2686: dharmoddānādhikāreṇa vānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārā jñeyā yāvacchāntato nirvāṇam /
SA01abhsubhu:2690: yathāvadbhāvikatāyā nirdaśe ṣoḍaśaprakārā uktāstrayaśca vimokṣākārāḥ teṣāṃ cānyonyasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2699: na hyeṣāṃ nirhetuka utpādo nāpīśvarādiviṣamahetuka iti yajjñānamidaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2701: tadyathā sucaritasyeṣṭo vipāko duścaritasyāniṣṭa ityevamādi yajjñānamidaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:2717: udakena kleda ityevamādikā prasiddhā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā /
SA01abhsubhu:2718: yathoktaṃ cakṣuḥ samṛddhaṃ śūnyaṃ nityena yāvadātmīyena /
SA01abhsubhu:2721: nāmaparyeṣaṇā nāmakāyādīnāṃ prajñaptisattvādapariniṣpannameṣāṃ svalakṣaṇamiti yā vicāraṇā /
SA01abhsubhu:2722: vastuparyeṣaṇā skandhādīnāṃ tathāpariniṣpattiryathā nāmakāyādibhirabhilapyanta iti yā saṃtīraṇā parīkṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2726: tathāhi vyutpannavyavahārasyābhidhānamātraṃ śrutvā tadabhidheye saṃpratyaya utpadyate smṛtimukhena,
SA01abhsubhu:2728: ityevaṃvidhe saṃbandhe prasiddhe cakṣurityevamādisvalakṣaṇaprajñaptimātraṃ tadākhyāmāsapiṇḍādivyavahārasya nimittaṃ bhavatīti yā parīkṣeyamucyate svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā /
SA01abhsubhu:2732: tatra ādhāro yādṛśaṃ bāhuśrutyaṃ śamathavipaśyanayoḥ pratiṣṭhā bhavatyālaṃbanayogena tadādhāra ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2740_0: kathaṃ ca punaḥ bodhisattva ekasyāṃ yaugabhūmau prayukto nopalambhaṃ spṛśati saṃbhṛtapuṇyajñāna
SA01abhsubhu:2742: niśritya dhyāyati tattasmātsamāhitāccittādananyaditi saṃpaśyaṃstasmin pratibimbe viṣayasaṃjñāṃ vyāvartya tadākāraṃ svasaṃjñāmātramavadhārayati /
SA01abhsubhu:2743: tadā cāsau svacittamātrāvasthānādadhyātma sthitacitto bhavan sarvathā grāhyabhāvaṃ prativedayate /
SA01abhsubhu:2744: tataśca grāhyābhāvādgrāhakamapi na pariniṣpannamiti tasyāpyabhāvaṃ parivedayate /
SA01abhsubhu:2746: etadeva cādhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā pratibimbaṃ manaḥ paśyanniti vistaraḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2749: sā ceyaṃ yogabhūmirhetutaḥ phalataśca nirdiṣṭā veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:2752_1: ca gṛhṇātītyatra sūtre taireva pañcabhirdharmairlaghugrahaṇādīni catvāri yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:2762: dharmavihārī bhikṣurdharmavihāri bhikṣuriti bhadantocyata ityatra sūtre bhagavatā samastena śrutacintābhāvanāvihāreṇa dharmavihāro bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:2764: tatra paryāptisvādhyāyadeśanābahulā vitarkaṇā bahulāścetyanena kevalaṃ śrutacintāprayuktā na bhāvanāprayuktā yogādiriñcanādato [na] dharmavihāriṇo vyavasthāpyante /
SA01abhsubhu:2765: yo 'pi kaścicchrutacintāmanāgamya kevalaṃ bhāvanāprayuktaḥ syātso 'pi na dharmavihārī vyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2766: tata eva tāvaddharmavihāriṇaṃ bhikṣumārabhya iha tu bhikṣurddharmaṃ paryāpnoti sūtraṃ geyamiti vistareṇoktvā paścādāha na riñcati yogamityevamādi,
SA01abhsubhu:2767: yathā vijñāyeta śrutaṃ cintāṃ bhāvanāṃ cāgamya tadubhayavihāreṇa dharmavihārīti /
SA01abhsubhu:2768: na riñcati yogamityevamādinā samādhiprayogāsaṃtuṣṭibhyāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ saṃdarśitam /
SA01abhsubhu:2769: samādhiprayogaḥ [Abhidh-s-bh_102] punardvividhaḥ saṃdarśitaḥ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogasaṃgṛhītaśca na riñcati yogamityanena,
SA01abhsubhu:2778: sarvākārayorvodhisattvābhyudayaniḥśreyasamārgayostisṛbhistisṛbhiśca saṃgrahāt ṣaḍevapāramitā na bhūyasyo nālpoyasya itīyaṃ tanmātrasaṃkhyā //
SA01abhsubhu:2811: yadbodhisattvasya bodhisattvadharmatāyāṃ vyavasthitasya bodhicittaṃ niśritya karuṇāpuraḥsareṇa cetasā sarvāstiparityāge kāyavāṅmanaskarma /
SA01abhsubhu:2812: evaṃ ca kṛtvā dānapāramitāyāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ gotrataḥ praṇidhānata āśayato vastutaḥ svabhāvataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2817: kāyavāṅmanaskarmasvabhāva ityevaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2819: śīlakṣāntivīryapāramitāsu yathākramaṃ sarvasaṃvarasamādānānurakṣāyāṃ sarvāpakāraduḥkhamarṣaṇādhivāsanāyāṃ sarvakuśaladharmasamudānayanatāyāṃ yatkāyavāṅmanaskarmeti veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2821: prajñāpāramitā[yāṃ] sarvākārakāyavāṅmanaskarmavibhutve yaḥ sarvākāro dharmapravicaya iti vaktavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2823: punaryaddānaṃ sarvajñatāmārabhya sarvajñatāyai saṃvartate sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatākṛtyaṃ ca karoti taddānapārimitetyucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2824: etāni punaścatvāri padāni yathākramamārambhato vāsanātaḥ kāyato nisyandataśca veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:2828: tadeva yadā paripūrṇaṃ bhavati tadā dharmakāyapariniṣpādanayogena sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA01abhsubhu:2831_1: bodhisattvo mahāntamapi bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya śīlasamādānaṃ karoti /
SA01abhsubhu:2832: śīlānurakṣī - ākruṣṭena mayā na pratyākroṣṭavyam - ityevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ kṣamo bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:2836: saṃpannadhyānaśca samāhitacitto yathābhūtajñānāllokottarāṃ prajñāṃ pratilabhata iti //
SA01abhsubhu:2882: niṣpattiparamatvaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau tāthāgatyāṃ ca bodhisattvapariniṣpattyā buddhapariniṣpattyā ceti //
SA01abhsubhu:2887: punaḥ parānātmānaṃ ca paramāmīti tārayantoti pāramitāḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:2894: kṣaticittaṃ punaryenāpa kāriṇāṃ pratyapakāraḥ kriyate tasyāgatasyānayā vilopanaṃ tiraskaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2895: kṣatameṣāṃ vairaṃ vidyata iti kṣatinasteṣāmabhayaprakāśanaṃ kṣemasyāviṣkaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2898: vṛddhaye īhā kuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dvābhyāṃ samyakprahāṇābhyāṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2906: tatra parapraṇītajñānaṃ parato ghoṣānvayā yoniśomanaskārasaṃprayuktā prajñā,
SA01abhsubhu:2914: hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ vipākasaṃniśritā ya ātmabhāvasaṃpattibalena /
SA01abhsubhu:2923: āśayasaṃniśritā pāramitābhāvanā ṣaḍākārā - atṛptāśayena vaipulyāśayena muditāśayenopakarāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2925: yathā caikasattvasyaivaṃ yāvān sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2926: tamanena paryāyeṇa pratipādayedatṛpta eva bodhisattvasya dānāśaya iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2928: na ca bodhisattva evaṃrūpāṃ dānaparaṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātramapi hāpayati vicchinattyābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāditi /
SA01abhsubhu:2929: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne vipulāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2931: na ca te sattvāstena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2932: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2933: upakaratarāṃśca bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā dānenopakaroti nātmānam,
SA01abhsubhu:2935: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne upakarāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2936: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tathā vipulamapi dānamayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vārthī bhavati vipākena veti /
SA01abhsubhu:2937: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2938: yadbodhisattvastathā vipulasyāpi dānaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:2940: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2943: etena paryāyeṇa yāvacchīlaskandho yāvatprajñāskandho yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
SA01abhsubhu:2945: atṛpta evaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanā[yā]māśaya iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2946: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattva[sya] śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmatṛptāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyām /
SA01abhsubhu:2947: yadbodhisattvastāṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāparaṃparāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāparaṃparamā bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanānna bhraṃśayati na vicchinattīti /
SA01abhsubhu:2948: ya evaṃrūpa āśāyo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2949: muditataraśca bodhisattvo bhavati tayā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā sattvānanugṛhṇan,
SA01abhsubhu:2950: na tveva te sattvā anugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2951: ya evaṃrūpaāśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ muditāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2952: upakaratarāṃśca sa bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā upakarāti nātmānam,
SA01abhsubhu:2954: ya evarūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāmupakarāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2955: na ca bodhisattvastathā vipulamapi śīlapāramitāmayaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāmayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya tasya pratikāreṇa [Abhidh-s-bh_108] vārthī bhavati vipākena veti /
SA01abhsubhu:2956: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2957: tatra yadbodhisattva evaṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayasya yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayasya puṇyaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:2959: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:2964: tatra kāyavibhutvaṃ tāthāgatau dvau kāyau draṣṭavyau svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogikaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:2965: tatra caryāvibhutvaṃ nairmāṇikaḥ kāyo draṣṭavyo yena sarvākārāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sahadhārmikacaryāṃ darśayati /
SA01abhsubhu:2985: pratyekaṃ dānādīnāṃ traivighyāt tribhistribhirupastambhairyathākramaṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2986: tatra trividhaṃ dānam - abhayadānaṃ dharmadānamāmiṣadānaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2987: trividhaṃ śīlam - saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2989: trividhaṃ vīryam - saṃnāhavīryaṃ prayogavīryaṃ sattvārthakriyāvīryaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2990: trividhaṃ dhyānam - dṛṣṭadharmasukhāvihārāya dhyānamabhijñānirhārāya dhyānaṃ sattvārthakriyāyai ca dhyānam /
SA01abhsubhu:2991: trividhā prajñā - saṃvṛtyālaṃbanā paramārthālaṃbanā sattvārthālambanā ca //
SA01abhsubhu:2994: abhayadānaṃ cittopastambhaḥ daurmanasyaviśeṣā[pa]gamāya cetasa āśvāsāya saṃhārāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2998: kuśalamūlākṣayatā sarvasattveṣu kriyārthādhikāritayā yāvatsāraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe 'pi nirvāṇadhātāvaparityāgaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:3000: gaṇaparikarṣaṇaṃ karmaṃ adhigamaṃ niśritya vineyānāmasamāhitasya cittasya samādhānāya samāhitasya vā cittasya vimokṣāyāvavādānuśāsanopradānam,
SA01abhsubhu:3005: punaḥ prabhedaḥ sapta dānāmi - mūladānaṃ gotrāvasthasya bodhisattvasya dānapāramitā,
SA01abhsubhu:3013: vinā vāhyenopakaraṇaparigraheṇa gaganagañjādisamādhibhirākāśe pāṇiṃ saṃcārya yatheṣṭaṃ ratnādivarṣaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:3027: tadanena viśiṣṭena cittotpādena pāramitānāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:3030: yatpunaḥ parānupakaraṇopasaṃhāreṇānugṛhṇātyayaṃ svārthaḥ evamavaśiṣṭābhiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3040: ityevaṃ tathatāsamyajjñānasvabhāvataḥ paramārtho dānādibhiḥ saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3042: vipakṣo dānādīnāṃ yathākramaṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlye krodhakauśīdye vikṣepadauḥprajñe /
SA01abhsubhu:3043: api khalu yāvantaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pāramitābhiḥ saṃgṛhītāsteṣāṃ yo vipakṣo jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca sa tāsāṃ vipakṣo veditavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3049: mahābhogatā sugatigamanamavarābhedasukhasaumanasya bahulatā sattvādhipapatyamavyābādhyātmabhāvatā maheśākhyatā ca yathākramaṃ dānādīnāṃ vipākaphalaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:3057: tatraiva yā maitracittasya paratravighātotpīḍāviheṭhasaṃvaraṇatā sā śīlapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:3059: tatraiva yā bhūyo bhūyaścittasyotsahanatā sā vīryapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:3060: tatraiva yā cittasyaikāgratā kuśalādbahiravisaraṇatā sā dhyānapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:3061: tatraiva yā yathāvaddhetu phalasugṛhītatā dṛṣṭyaparāmarṣaṇatā sā prajñāpāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:3062: evaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyamubhayadānaṃ sarvajñajñānamiti kṛtvā //
SA01abhsubhu:3065: tatra dānādīnāṃ svabhāvo yathākramaṃ visargaḥ saṃvaro marṣaṇābhyutsāhaścitasthitiḥ pravicayaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:3067: tatra dānādīnāmupayogaḥ samādāpanā varṇavāditā sumanojñatā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:3068: tatra dānādīnāṃ ropaṇā yā parasaṃtāne pratiṣṭhāpanā /
SA01abhsubhu:3076: syāddānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayāsaṃgṛhītā yā dānapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:3081: syāt pāramitā na dānaṃ śīlādayo mahābodhipariṇāmitāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3082: syāddānaṃ ca pāramitā ca [Abhidh-s-bh_112] bodhipariṇāmitāni dānādīni /
SA01abhsubhu:3083: syānna dānaṃ na pāramitā uktavinirmuktā dharmāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3085: yo dānaṃ samācarati sarvo 'sau dānapāramitānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatīti catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:3091: viśeṣato vaipulye audāryagāmbhīryadeśanā tatphalasya sarvajñatvasya paramodāragambhīratvātphalānurūpyeṇa hetunirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3092: ekatyānāṃ tadanadhimokṣe trāsaḥ bodhisattvagotravaikalyaṃ prakṛtyā hīnacittatayā gāmbhīryaudāryadeśanāṃ nādhimoktuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA01abhsubhu:3095: adhimucyamānānāmapyekatyānāmaniryāṇaṃ nītārtha sūtrama[na]nviṣya svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarṣasthāyitayā yathārutamarthābhiniveśāta /
SA01abhsubhu:3097: evamanye 'pi yathārutārthābhiniveśino mahāyāne na niryāntotiveditavyaṃ nānābhiprāyabhāṣitatvāt mahāyānasyeti /
SA01abhsubhu:3098: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye - bodhisattvasya yathārutamayoniśo dharmān vicinvato 'ṣṭāviṃśatirasaddṛṣṭaya utpadyante //
SA01abhsubhu:3101_0: tatra nisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādikaṃ mahāyāne rutamupalabhya tadabhisaṃdhyakuśalāḥ
SA01abhsubhu:3101_1: yathārutamevāsyārthamadhimucyamānā abhāva evāyaṃ bhagavatā deśitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpāda
SA01abhsubhu:3102: ta evamabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśamānāstrīnsvabhāvānavadante parikalpitaṃ svabhāvaṃ paratantraṃ pariniṣpannaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:3103: tatrāyaṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo yadrūpamiti vā yāvannirvāṇāmiti vābhilāpaprajñaptimātrabhabhūto niḥśarīrārtho yadbālā rūpādilakṣaṇaṃ samāropattaḥ parikalpayanti /
SA01abhsubhu:3105: tatrāyaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ [Abhidh-s-bh_113] tathatā /
SA01abhsubhu:3107: ta evaṃ sarvathā sarvadharmānapavadamānāstasyā apavādadṛṣṭeḥ pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ kāṃcideva yuktiṃ parigṛhṇanti,
SA01abhsubhu:3108: ye 'pi nītārthāḥ sūtrāntā nirabhilāpadharmatādyotakāstānapi sarvān svadṛṣṭayānulomyena pariṇāmayanti /
SA01abhsubhu:3109: te eva dve dṛṣṭo bhavataḥ parigrahadṛṣṭiḥ pariṇatidṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:3110: te punarevaṃdṛṣṭayo bhavanti - ya etāmīdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā samācarati sa niravadya eva bhavati nirdoṣaḥ sarvamevāsya tatkalyāṇatāṃ yāti,
SA01abhsubhu:3112: te caivaṃ svadṛṣṭāvabhiniviṣṭāstad dṛṣṭiviparyayeṇa skandhādidharmavyavasthāpakaṃ śrāvakapiṭakamavajānanti,
SA01abhsubhu:3114: te ete dve dṛṣṭī bhavato 'vajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:3115: svadṛṣṭyanusāreṇa caite yathāvacchūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vyavasthāpayamānā atallakṣaṇe tallakṣaṇasaṃjñino viparītameṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
SA01abhsubhu:3116: evaṃcittāśca bhavanti - yasyāmīdṛśyāṃ dharmatāyāmavatarantyavatārayanti vā sarve te 'prameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantītyevamete dṛṣṭī viparītadṛṣṭiḥ prasavadṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:3117: yadā punaste tāṃ dṛṣṭimārabhya paraṃranuyujyante tadā na kiṃcitsvayamicchantyabhyupagantum,
SA01abhsubhu:3120: te caivamabhimānino bhavanti - ya evaṃ pratipadyante [te] samyagbuddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayanti satkurvantītyeṣāṃ satkāradṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3121: aviparītadharmatākuśalaiśca tatā dṛṣṭervivecyamānāḥ sūpapannayā prasiddhayā yuktayā pratyāyamānā api tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na kathaṃcit parityajanti,
SA01abhsubhu:3123: etāsāṃ ca yathānirdiṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ yadvāsanādauṣṭhulyaṃ sā mūladṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3124: eta eva ca saptadaśadṛṣṭayo doṣodbhāvanāmukhenāvaśiṣṭābhiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ punarnidiśyante /
SA01abhsubhu:3147: ata evānantaraṃ tatraiva sūtra uktamitīmāḥ saptadaśa samānāḥ daśa bhavanti,
SA01abhsubhu:3153: yena vā svabhāvenaite pūrvamabhūvanna tena svena bhāvena bhūyaḥ śakyamebhirbhavitumiti niḥsvabhāvāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3155: yādṛśo vādṛṣṭasatyairdharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo lakṣaṇamabhilāpaprapañcavāsanāmukhena gṛhyate tena bālagrāhānurūpeṇa svabhāvena vi[ra]hitatvānniḥ svabhāvāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3156: api khalu sarvadharmā ucyante trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3157: tatra parikalpitasya svalakṣaṇameva nāstyataḥ svalakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3158: paratantrasya svayamutpattirnāsti pratyayāpekṣaṇādato nāsya svena bhāvena bhāva ityutpattiniḥ svabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3159: pariniṣpanno viśuddhyālaṃbanatvāt paratantraparikalpitalakṣaṇābhāvasvabhāvatvācca paramārthaścaiṣa niḥsvabhāvatāprabhāvitaśceti paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /

SA01abhsubhu:3907_0: skandhamātre saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ cānātmanīti pradarśayatā yāvaccāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ yāvadanuttarāṃ
SA01abhsubhu:3918: tena prakāreṇa tasya rūpādikasya vastunaḥ parijñānāt /
SA01abhsubhu:3936: āvaraṇaprahāṇe nāśrayaparivṛttisākṣātkaraṇāt bhāvanālakṣaṇaṃ viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulavihāraḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3937: prakārabhedalakṣaṇam - tattvalakṣaṇasya pañcadhā bhedo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:3938: parijñālakṣaṇasya tridhā bheda āsvādaṃ cāsvādayato yāvanniḥsaraṇaṃ ca niḥsarato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA01abhsubhu:3940: tatra sadevakāllokādyāvatsadevamānuṣāyāḥ prajāyā vimuktiḥ kleśebhyo vimokṣādata eva tadviśeṣaṇārthamāha niḥsṛta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:3943: evamanāgataduḥkhābhinirvartaka kleśavisaṃyoge sati duḥkhādapi vipramukto bhavatīti viśeṣaṇārthamāha - visaṃyukto vipramukta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:3952: balābalamukhaṃ yatraikena padenānucyamānenāyamartho na gamitaḥ syāditi pratyekaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāṃ sāmarthya pradarśyate /
SA01abhsubhu:3955: eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthya pūrvavadveditavya yathā pratītyasamutpādasya lakṣaṇanirdeśe //
SA01abhsubhu:3957: pratyāhāramukhaṃ yatra sūtrasyaikaṃ padaṃ gṛhītvā vistareṇārthaḥ pratinirdiśyate /
SA01abhsubhu:3958: tadyathā ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣurhimavantamapi parvatarājaṃ mukhavāyunā cālayet,
SA01abhsubhu:3961: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuścittasyotpādakuśalo bhavati iha bhikṣurviviktaṃ kāmairyāvaccaturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
SA01abhsubhu:3964: iha bhikṣurāsevanānvayādyaddhānabhāgīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tat sthitibhāgīyaṃ karoti /
SA01abhsubhu:3970: iha bhikṣuranutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe /
SA01abhsubhu:3973: iha hi bhikṣurutpannānāṃ pāpakā nāmakuśalānāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe /
SA01abhsubhu:3976: iha hi bhikṣuśchandasamādhipradhānasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayatīti vistareṇa catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3979: teṣvapi catuṣkādiṣvekaikaṃ padamaparaiścatuṣkādibhiraparyanto hi nirhāro veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3980: tadyathā buddhākṣepasūtre - catvāra ime bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipariśodhakā dharmāḥ - śūnyatābhāvanā,
SA01abhsubhu:3984: catuṣkaḥ svārtha paramārtha cārabhya bodhipariśodhanāya caturvipakṣapratipakṣeṇa veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3993: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ - prathamena jñānasaṃbhārastribhiḥ puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ paridīpitaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:3999: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ śūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti - adhyātmaṃ cittāvikaṃpanatayādhimuktipravicayabalādhānatayā,
SA01abhsubhu:4002: yadāśritya yathā ca bhāvayanti tadetena paridīpitam /
SA01abhsubhu:4007: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattveṣvapratihatacittā bhavanti maitrībhāvanayā,
SA01abhsubhu:4011: atrāpi yadāśritya yathā cāpratihatacittā bhavanti tatparidīpitaṃ bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:4018: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bodhisattvānāṃ nityaṃ hitamupasaṃharanti - ātmanaḥ paritulanatayā,
SA01abhsubhu:4027: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā nirāmiṣeṇa cittena dharmadānaṃ saṃprakāśayanti - antarāyasukhaprativedhatayā,
SA01abhsubhu:4041: prabhidyasaṃdarśana[vi]niścayo yathānirdiṣṭeṣu skandhādiṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogamekāvacārakādīni / tatra -
SA01abhsubhu:4042: ekāvacārako nāma praśno yenaikaṃ dharmaṃ pariśiṣṭaiḥ saha pratyekaṃ praśnayitvā tamapahāya dvitīyaṃ tenānyaiśca saha praśnayatyevamekaikasyaiva sarvān praśnayati /
SA01abhsubhu:4044: yo vā rūpāyatanena cakṣurāyatanenāpi sa iti pūrvapādakaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4045: yaścakṣurāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:4046: evaṃ yāvanmanaāyatanenāpi sa ityatra yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:4049: yo vā cakṣurāyatanena rūpāyatanenāpi sa iti paścātpādakaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4050: yo rūpāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra cāpi paścātpādakaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4052: yaḥ śrotrāyatanena samanvāgataścakṣurāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:4055: pūrvapādakaṃ dvayordharmayoḥ kathaṃcideva dharmamārabhya parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoḥ pūrvadharmamadhiṣṭhāya yadvayākriyate /
SA01abhsubhu:4056: tadyathā yajjñānaṃ jñeyamapi tadyadvā jñeyaṃ jñānamapi taditi /
SA01abhsubhu:4060: paścātpādakaṃ tathaiva dvayordharmayoḥ parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoryatpaścimamadhiṣṭhāya vyākriyate /
SA01abhsubhu:4061: tadyathā yadgrāhyaṃ grāhakamapi tadyadvā grāhakaṃ grāhyamapi taditi /
SA01abhsubhu:4064: rūpādayaḥ pañca viṣayā dharmāyatanaṃ ca saṃprayuktakavarjyam //
SA01abhsubhu:4065: dvikoṭikaṃ yatra dve koṭī vyākriyete tadanyāsaṃbhavāt tadyathā skandhasya vyavasthānaṃ dhātuvyavasthānaṃ ca nigamayyocyate - yā skandhasaṃkhyā dhātusaṃkhyāpi sā,
SA01abhsubhu:4069: tathāhi naiko dhāturasti yaḥ sakalarūpaskandhalakṣaṇo vā syāt sakalavijñānaskandhalakṣaṇo vā /
SA01abhsubhu:4073: trikoṭikaṃ yatra tisra eva koṭayo vyākriyante /
SA01abhsubhu:4080: syāt skandhasaṃkhyāyatanasaṃkhyā ca vijñānaskandho manaāyatanaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:4084: yo vā śrotrendriyeṇa samanvāgataścakṣurindriyeṇāpi sa iti /
SA01abhsubhu:4089: oṃkāritaṃ yatra praśne vyākaraṇamomiti kriyate evametadityabhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4091: ye vā saṃskārāḥ sarve te 'nityā iti pṛṣṭena omiti vyākartavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:4093: tadyathā skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ katibhiḥ satyaiḥ saṃgṛhītā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:4094: prātikṣepikam - na santi skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārā iti //
SA01abhsubhu:4121: ete cānupalambhā yat kiṃcidatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ yāvadyadvā dūre yadvāntika ityetadanukramānusāreṇa draṣṭavyāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4124: yo nopalabhate yadyena yasmai yato yasya yatra nopalabhate yāvadvividhaścānupalambha iti //
SA01abhsubhu:4150: rājakulaṃ yatra rājā svayaṃ saṃnihitaḥ yuktakulaṃ yatra rājñādhiyuktāḥ sabhā vaṇik sabhādi /
SA01abhsubhu:4151: prāmāṇikāḥ sahāyakāḥ yeṣāṃ vacanaṃ vādiprativādinau na saṃśayataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4152: dharmārthakuśalāśca śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye teṣu śāstreṣu granthataścārthataśca vyutpannabuddhayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4153: vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ yadadhiṣṭhāya vādaḥ kriyate tadyathā sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca //
SA01abhsubhu:4154: tatra svabhāvaḥ sādhya ātmasvabhāvo dharmasvabhāvaśca nāstīti vāstīti vā //
SA01abhsubhu:4155: viśeṣaḥ sādhya ātmaviśeṣo dharmaviśeṣaśca sarvagato na sarvagato nityānityo rūpyarūpītyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4157: sādhyagrahaṇaṃ yadi na kriyeta siddhasyāpi svapakṣasya pareṣāṃ deśanā pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:4158: svarucitārthagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta parapakṣasyāpi sādhyasya vacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:4159: paragrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta ekākino 'pi tadvacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:4160: saṃprāpaṇagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta kāyenāpi tadarthābhinayanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:4161: vijñāpanāgrahaṇaṃ na kriyetāvijñāte 'pi tadarthe śrotṛbhiḥ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:4162: yathokte tu vyavasthāne sarva ete doṣā na bhavanti,
SA01abhsubhu:4166: tathāhi pratyakṣānupalaṃbhādupalaṃbhādvetyanena samākhyānena tasmin sādhye 'pratītasyārthasya saṃpratyaya utpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:4168: pratyakṣopalaṃbhānupalaṃbhau punaḥ svabhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyau //
SA01abhsubhu:4172: yathā sādhyo 'rthastribhiravayavaiḥ sādhitastathā śiṣṭānāmapi tajjātīyānāṃ sādhyānāṃ sādhitārthadharmopagamāya nayatvena samākhyānaṃ yuktyātideśa upanayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4179: sa hyātmā prajñapyamānaḥ skandhalakṣaṇo vā prajñapyeta,
SA01abhsubhu:4183: tadyadi skandhalakṣaṇastenāsvatantrāḥ skandhāḥ pratītyasamutpannā udagavyayadharmāṇastallakṣaṇa ātmānopapadyata iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4184: atha skandheṣu tenānityaskandhāśrita ātmānityaḥ prāpnotīti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4185: athānyatra skandhebhyastena nirdehaka ātmā niṣprayojana iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4186: athāskandhakastena prakṛtyaiva muktasya kevalino mokṣārthaprayatnavaiyarthyamiti doṣaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4188: taddhayatītaṃ vidyamānalakṣaṇatvena prajñapyamānaṃ vartamānalakṣaṇaṃ vā prajñapyeta,
SA01abhsubhu:4189: vartamāne vā anyatra vā vartamānāt vartamānanirapekṣaṃ vā /
SA01abhsubhu:4191: atha vartamāne tenāniruddhe niruddhātmakasya saṃbandho na yujyata iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4192: athānyatra vartamānāttena vartamānaṃ hitvā na kiṃcittadvastūpalabhyate yatra tatprajñapyata iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4195: ato 'nena vartamānaprajñaptau caturdoṣeṇa siddhenāsiddha ātmā nāstīti skandhaprajñaptau caturvidhadoṣopalaṃbhāt prasādhyate nāstīti //
SA01abhsubhu:4196: evamātmaviparyāsaṃ pratiṣidhyaitayaiva yuktyā nityādayo 'pi na santītyatideśa upanayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4197: yasmādetadevaṃ tasmādanityāḥ pañca skandhāḥ yāvadanātmāna iti nigamanamiti //
SA01abhsubhu:4200: sadgrahaṇaṃ ghaṭādidravyāṇāṃ loke pratyakṣasaṃmatānāṃ pratyakṣatvavyudāsārtha prajñaptimātratvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:4205_0: pratyakṣādyadanyacchiṣṭamapratyakṣaṃ niyamena tatsahavarti prasiddhaṃ draṣṭuḥ pūrvaṃ
SA01abhsubhu:4205_1: tasya tatpratyakṣamīkṣamāṇasya tadanyasmin śiṣṭasaṃpratyaya utpadyate tenāpyatra
SA01abhsubhu:4208: yatropadeśe tatpratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sarvathā na virudhyete na vyabhicarataḥ sa āptāgamaḥ saṃpratyayitvāt //
SA01abhsubhu:4209: vādālaṃkāro yena yukto vādī vādaṃ kurvāṇo 'tyarthaṃ śobhate /
SA01abhsubhu:4211: tatra svaparasamayajñatā svasiddhāntaṃ parasiddhāntaṃ cārabhya granthataścārthataśca paurvāparyeṇa nirantaraṃ vyutpattiparipākaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4218: tatra kathātyāgo 'sādhu mama sādhu tavetyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ svaparavādadoṣaguṇābhyupagamaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4220: yathoktaṃ sūtre - āyuṣmāṃścundikastīrthikaiḥ saha vādaṃ kurvannavajānitvā pratijānāti pratijānitvāvajānātīti /
SA01abhsubhu:4236: [Abhidh-s-bh_154] asthiraṃ yatpratijñāyāvajñātamavajñāya pratijñātamatitvaramāṇayā vācā hi tūrṇaparāmṛṣṭaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4242: akaraṇena vā guṇadoṣau vicārya vādasya nigrahasthānānāsādanāt,
SA01abhsubhu:4248: tadyathā svaparasamayajñatā vāde bahukaro dharmo yena sarvatra kathāvastuni vādaṃ karoti /
SA01abhsubhu:4250: kuśalapakṣaprayuktenetyuktvā pratipattisārakeṇeti vacanamāśayaviśuddhijñāpanārthaṃ na lābhasatkārādinimittaṃ śrutādikuśalapakṣe prayuktenetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4252: evaṃ ca svahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyata ityayameṣāṃ padānāmanusaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4253: avigṛhyāpi tāvadvāde kriyamāṇe prakṛtigambhīratvānmahāyānadharmasya durlabhājñā prāgeva vigṛhya /
SA01abhsubhu:4254: yaiśca saha vigṛhya vādaḥ kriyate te 'pi pratipattāro nājñābhiprāyāḥ pratibruvanti kiṃtarhyupālambhābhiprāyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4255: yeṣvapi prāśnikeṣu sa vādaḥ kriyate te vāsabhyā avyutpannā vā bhavantyabhiniviṣṭā vā /
SA01abhsubhu:4256: sarvo 'pi ca vādā prāyeṇa ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:4257: tathāhi vādaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kadācidatirabhasenāsatpakṣamapi parigṛhyābhiniveśena chalajātinigrahasthānānyapi prayukte /
SA01abhsubhu:4262: svayaṃ ca teṣu cittaṃ pradūṣayatītyebhiḥ ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati //
SA01abhsubhu:4265: sati cānupaśame durlabhaṃ paracittānurakṣaṇaṃ svacittānurakṣaṇaṃ ca yena pare prasādaṃ labheran vimuktyāyatanayogena svacittaṃ samādhīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:4266: prāyeṇa vāde kathamahaṃ jayeyaṃ pare parājīyerannityevaṃ cittaṃ samudācarati /
SA01abhsubhu:4270: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā ityasyāṃ gāthāyāṃ loke yadatyarthamavadyaṃ pātakaṃ tadabhidhāyīnyakṣarāṇyetāni viśuddhau pariṇāmitāni /
SA01abhsubhu:4275: tatra pratiniyato gurujano mātā pitā ca,
SA01abhsubhu:4297: hīno loke caturvidhaḥ - manaskarmahīnaḥ kāyakarmahīno vākkarmahīna upabhogahīnaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:4305: upabhogahī naḥ śvā kā kaḥ preto vetyevamādikaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:4314: vāntāśo dṛṣṭe dharme upakaraṇabalena kāyaṃ saṃdhā rayato 'pi bhogajīvitāśābhāvāditi //
SA01abhsubhu:4317: śarīraṃ punarasyāḥ samādhiṃ niśritya bodhisattvā darśanabhāvanāmārgābhyāṃ mahābodhiṃ spṛśantīti //
SA01abhsubhu:4327: tatra parameṇa brahmacaryeṇa samanvāgata iti lokottareṇa mārgeṇetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4328: nānyatra maithunānmaithunasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣata iti tasyaiva yathābhūta parijñānena tatprahāṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:4334: maithunapratipakṣeṇa ca dharmeṇottrasyati tatpratipakṣeṇa mārgeṇa sarvasattvottaraṇāya vyavasyatīti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:4335_0: abhīkṣṇaṃ ca dvayadvayaṃ samāpadyate saṃkleśavyavada nadvayena phalahetubhedena catuḥsatyātmakena
SA01abhsubhu:4341: ityabhidharmasamuccaye bhāṣyataḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayo nāma pañcamaḥ samuccayaḥ samāptaḥ //
